- Dissolve jello in water; add crushed drained pineapple.
- Add strawberries, bananas and walnuts.
- Pour 1/2 mix in pan; put in fridge until jello is firm (about 1/2 hour), then spread 1 pint remaining jello mixture over sour cream.
- Chill and serve.

Artichoke Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. chicken or beef broth
- 1 c. regular rice
- 1/4 c. diced green pepper
- 1/4 c. sliced green onion
- 1/4 c. sliced pimento olives
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 (6 oz.) jar marinated artichokes with liquid, chopped
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 tsp. dill weed

Directions:
- Cook the first 2 ingredients and add remaining ingredients. Chill before serving.

Party Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 2) can (2 1/2 c.) crushed pineapple
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime gelatin
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1/3 c. chopped pimiento
- 1 c. heavy cream, whipped
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. chopped walnuts

Directions:
- Heat pineapple to boiling; add gelatin and stir until dissolved.
- Chill until partially set.
- Soften cream cheese; stir in pimiento.
- Add to gelatin mixture and blend.
- Fold in whipped cream, celery and nuts.
- Pour into 1 1/2-quart mold and chill until firm.

Fruited Cabbage Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. shredded cabbage
- 1 medium red apple, diced
- 1 medium firm banana, sliced
- 1/3 c. chopped pecans
- 2 Tbsp. raisins
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. milk
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Combine first five ingredients and set aside.
- In a jar with a tight fitting lid, combine the mayonnaise, milk, sugar, lemon juice; shake well.
- Pour over cabbage mixture and toss to coat.

Mignonette Of Beef

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. dry red wine
- 1/2 tsp. Tabasco
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/4 tsp. thyme
- 1 bay leaf
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 medium onion, thinly sliced
- 2 lb. sirloin beef
- vegetables of choice

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients well, except beef and vegetables, then add the beef, cut into 1 1/2 to 2-inch cubes.
- Refrigerate at least 5 hours or overnight.
- Alternate meat and vegetables of your choice on skewer.
- Broil about 20 minutes, brushing with sauce occasionally.

One Dish Ham Bake(Chicken, Turkey Or Beef Can Be Used.)  

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. frozen broccoli cuts, rinsed and drained
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 1 can Cheddar cheese soup
- 1 c. milk
- 3 c. meat, cut in small pieces
- 1/2 tsp. onion powder (1/4 c. cut up onions can be used)
- 2 c. Bisquick
- 1 1/2 c. milk

Directions:
- Mix broccoli, soups, 1 cup milk, meat and onion.
- Put in 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Mix Bisquick and 1 1/2 cups milk and pour evenly over soup mixture.
- Bake 25 to 30 minutes in 450° oven.
- Let stand for 5 minutes before serving.
- Serve with tossed salad and French bread for complete meal.

Apple-Pecan Caramel Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. bite-sized pieces
- Granny Smith apples
- 1/4 c. broken pecan pieces, toasted
- 1/2 c. Dannon creme caramel light yogurt
- 1 Tbsp. light mayonnaise
- 1 packet sugar substitute (optional)
- 1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon

Directions:
- Combine apples and pecans in bowl.
- Mix yogurt, light mayonnaise, sugar substitute and cinnamon together and pour mixture over apples.
- Toss gently to coat.
- Chill until ready to serve.
- Serves 6.

Steak In A Bag

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 to 3 lb. boneless sirloin or top round steak (about 2 1/2-inch thick)
- 3 Tbsp. soft butter
- 2 large cloves garlic, mashed
- 4 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 tsp. seasoned salt
- 1 tsp. coarse ground pepper
- 1 c. coarse bread crumbs

Directions:
- You can roast the steak in dry heat in the oven, if you desire.
- Roast at 375° for 40 minutes.
- Wipe steak dry.
- Combine butter, garlic, oil, salt and pepper.
- Spread butter mixture on both sides of steak.
- Press crumbs firmly onto steak on both sides.
- Place in brown grocery type bag.
- Close with paper clips. Place on baking sheet.
- Bake at 375° for 45 minutes.
- Remove from oven.
- Let stand 5 minutes.
- Slide onto carving board.
- Carve into 1/4-inch diagonal slices to serve.

Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can strawberry pie filling
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. pecans

Directions:
- Mix together all ingredients and chill.

Wiener Schnitzel

Ingredients:
- 4 well-beaten veal cutlets
- 4 slices Gruyere cheese
- 1/3 c. butter
- 1 tsp. grated cheese
- bread crumbs
- lemon juice
- salt and pepper
- flour
- 1 beaten egg

Directions:
- Sprinkle veal with lemon juice, salt, pepper and grated cheese.
- Let sit for 5 minutes.
- Then roll in flour, egg and breadcrumbs.
- Fry on one side in hot butter.
- Turn.
- Reduce heat. Place cheese slice on each cutlet.
- Slowly fry other side.
- Serve with crisp salad.

Chinese Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 chicken breasts, cooked until tender
- 2 heads lettuce, broken into bite size pieces
- 6 to 8 green onions, chopped fine
- 1 c. sesame seed (2 pkg.)
- 1/2 pkg. or 1 c. sliced almonds
- fresh ginger, diced very fine
- Chinese noodles

Directions:
- When chicken is cool, break into small pieces.
- Store each of the first 3 ingredients in a Ziploc bag until ready to use.
- In a skillet, brown the sesame seed, almonds and ginger.
- Store in Ziploc bag until ready to use.

Fudge Fruit And Cream Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. vanilla instant pudding
- 1 1/2 c. buttermilk
- 1 carton whipping cream
- 1 (11 oz.) pkg. fudge striped cookies
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can pineapple tidbits, drained

Directions:
- Mix
- pudding and buttermilk.
- Fold in
- whipping
- cream. Break up cookies and fold into salad.
- Add oranges and pineapple. Chill.

Cool Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head broccoli
- 1 head cauliflower
- 1 pkg. cherry tomatoes
- 1 pkg. fresh mushrooms
- 1 large bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Cut vegetables into bite size pieces.
- Put in large bowl.
- Mix together and add dressing.
- Cover and refrigerate 6 hours or overnight.
- Stir and ready to serve.
- Serves approximately 10 people.

Pepper Steak

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. round steak, cut in thin strips
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 medium onion, sliced
- 1 medium green pepper, sliced
- 1 pkg. au jus gravy mix
- 1 3/4 c. water
- 4 tsp. soy sauce
- 1/2 tsp. ground ginger
- 3 c. hot cooked rice

Directions:
- Cook meat, onion and pepper in oil until browned.
- Stir in remaining ingredients except rice.
- Simmer for 45 minutes or 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
- Serve over rice.

Pickle And Onion Salad

Ingredients:
- onions
- dill pickles
- mayonnaise
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Cut into chunks the onions and pickles.
- Mix with mayonnaise to make sauce.
- Salt and pepper to taste.
- Serve with fried fish.

Easy, Good Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. cottage cheese
- 1 (9 oz.) Cool Whip
- 2 pkg. any flavor jello
- 1 large can any type fruit

Directions:
- In a bowl, mix together cottage cheese, Cool Whip and jello. Drain fruit and blend in. Chill before serving.

Barbecued Steak Platter(Cube Steaks)  

Ingredients:
- 4 Tbsp. ketchup
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- salt (if desired)

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients, heat and pour over 4 cube steaks. Let stand for 15 minutes.
- Drain and place steaks on rack 2 inches below broiler.
- Broil 5 minutes on each side, basting once or twice with sauce.
- Brown 4 bread slices in butter or margarine and arrange steaks on slices.
- Serve with onion and pickle.

Yum Yum Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small can crushed pineapple (juice included)
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon or lime Jell-O
- 1 c. shredded cheese
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 c. cold water
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts
- 1 c. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Boil pineapple and sugar together.
- Add Jell-O; when dissolved, add cup water.
- Refrigerate until almost jelled; add cheese, Cool Whip and nuts.

Satsuma Salad

Ingredients:
- 10 to 12 large satsumas
- 4 Tbsp. powdered sugar
- 1 c. shredded fresh coconut (frozen or packaged is okay)
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 (No. 2) can chunk pineapple
- 1/2 c. nutmeats, chopped

Directions:
- Peel the satsumas and cut crosswise into slices.
- Sprinkle powdered sugar over satsuma slices.
- Drain pineapple.
- Mix all ingredients together and let stand in refrigerator overnight (or at least 3 to 4 hours).
- To serve, spoon mixture onto lettuce leaves.

Chicken Aspic Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 envelopes plain gelatin
- 1 3/4 c. cold tomato juice
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- dash of Tabasco
- 3/4 c. cold chicken stock
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 1/2 c. diced chicken, cooked
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 3 Tbsp. green pepper, diced (optional)

Directions:
- Sprinkle 1 envelope gelatin in tomato juice.
- Heat, stirring, until dissolved.
- Add 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon lemon juice and dash of Tabasco.
- Set aside to cool.
- In separate saucepan, sprinkle 1 envelope gelatin in chicken stock.
- Heat; stir until dissolved.
- Remove from heat and add 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1 tablespoon lemon juice.
- Let cool.
- Add chicken, celery and green pepper.
- Pour 1/2 of mixture into loaf pan that has been Pam coated.
- Chill.
- When firm, add tomato aspic mixture.
- When aspic is almost firm, spread last half of chicken mix.
- Chill.
- Serve on lettuce.

Orange Molded Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. orange jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 11 oz. mandarin orange sections, drained
- 1 1/2 c. small marshmallows
- 1 (8 1/4 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 pt. orange sherbet
- 8 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add sherbet and place in refrigerator until partly set (watch carefully).
- Add other ingredients and fold in Cool Whip last.
- Chill and enjoy.

Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (11 oz.) can Mandarin oranges
- 1 (20 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 1 (16 oz.) can peach slices
- 3 bananas
- 2 red apples

Directions:
- Drain all fruit well.

Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. hamburger meat
- 1 pkg. French's Chili-O seasoning mix
- 1 bottle Ortega taco sauce
- 1 can kidney beans
- lettuce
- cheese
- tomatoes
- sour cream
- tostado chips

Directions:
- Brown meat and drain, then add seasoning mix, taco sauce and kidney beans.
- Let all this get hot, then its ready to eat.

Italian Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. (16 oz.) rotini pasta
- 1 can (8 oz.) tomato sauce with roasted garlic
- 1 c. fat free italian dressing
- 2 Tbsp. chopped basil
- 1 Tbsp. oregano leaves
- 1 pint cherry or grape tomatoes, halved or 5-6 roma tomatoes diced
- 2 cucumbers, chopped
- 1 red onion, chopped
- 1 can (2.25) sliced black olives, drained

Directions:
- Cook pasta according to package directions without adding fat or salt.
- Drain and rinse with cold water.
- Set aside.
- In a large bowl combine tomato sauce, dressing , basil, and oregano.
- Add tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and olives.
- Stir until coated.
- Add pasta and gently toss.
- Refrigerate at least 2 hours.

Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. whole, frozen strawberries
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 (9 oz.) tub Cool Whip
- 1 large can pineapple, crushed or chunks
- 2 bananas
- 1 c. small marshmallows

Directions:
- Cut strawberries in half.
- Slice bananas.
- Drain pineapple. Cream sugar and cheese together.
- Fold in tub of Cool Whip and marshmallows.
- Mix together the frozen strawberries, pineapple and pecans.
- Add to cheese mixture.
- Refrigerate.

Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple (juice off)
- 1 pkg. Philly cream cheese
- 2 Tbsp. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 bag miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. cream, whipped
- 2 c. chopped maraschino cherries

Directions:
- Cream the cream cheese and Miracle Whip and whip the cream in separate bowl.
- Fold crushed pineapple, marshmallows and chopped cherries into cream cheese and Miracle Whip.
- Last, add whipped cream.
- Put into 13 x 9-inch dish; freeze overnight.
- Let set at room temperature 1/2 hour before eating.

Johnny Marzetti

Ingredients:
- 1/2 lb. wide noodles
- 1/2 lb. ground beef (I use 1 lb.)
- chopped onion
- 1/2 lb. sharp cheese, grated or shredded
- 1/2 lb. mushrooms or 1 can chopped
- 1 green pepper
- 1 small can tomato paste
- 1 small jar salad olives, chopped
- 1 can tomato sauce
- 1 can water
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Brown beef, onions, pepper and mushrooms.
- Add tomato paste, sauce, water and Worcestershire sauce.
- Cook over low heat for 30 minutes.
- Arrange in 2 small or one large oblong dish.

Crab Meat Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 can crab meat
- Italian salad dressing
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Bake at 350° for 20 minutes and serve with Triscuits.

Chicken Salad Stuffed Shells

Ingredients:
- 32 Ronzoni jumbo shells
- 1/2 c. plain yogurt
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 Tbsp. curry powder
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 2 garlic cloves, pressed
- 2 c. cooked chicken in strips
- 1 1/2 c. red pepper, chopped
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. sliced scallions
- 1/2 c. sunflower seed (unsalted)

Directions:
- Cook pasta as directed; drain.
- Combine curry, yogurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice, mustard and garlic.
- Add chicken, red pepper, celery, scallions and sunflower seed.
- Toss lightly. Spoon 1 1/2 tablespoons into each shell.
- Chill.
- Serve on lettuce.

Linda'S Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkgs. Strawberry jell-O
- 1 can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 can strawberry pie filling
- 2 cups hot water
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Cream cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) container of sour cream
- 1/2 cup sugar

Directions:
- Mix jell-O with hot water.
- Add pineapple with the juice and the pie filling; mix well.
- Place in a 13 x 9 casserole dish.
- Let congeal in refrigerator.
- In a small bowl mix cream cheese, sour cream and sugar.
- Pour this mixture over congealed salad.

Applesauce Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 6 oz. pkg. raspberry jello
- 1 3/4 C. diluted frozen orange juice
- 2 C. applesauce
- 1 8 oz. can crushed pineapple with juice

Directions:
- Heat applesauce in pan. Stir in gelatin until dissolved. Add orange juice and pineapple. Stir until smooth. Pour into mold and chill.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 c. raw chopped broccoli
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 12 slices cooked, crumbled bacon
- 1/2 to 1 c. raisins

Directions:
- Combine ingredients and mix with sauce.

Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 lb. Red Bliss potatoes
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 medium onion
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Boil potatoes in their jackets until done.
- Peel while still hot; let cool.
- Slice in thin round slices.
- Mix in mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar.
- Grate onion and add with salt and pepper.
- Mix again.
- Chill thoroughly for 3 hours.

Frozen Waldorf Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs, beaten
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 (20 oz.) pineapple tidbits, drained
- 3/4 c. celery, diced
- 2 1/2 c. chopped apples (leave some skin for color)
- 1 1/2 c. seedless grapes, cut in half
- 1/2 c. or more chopped walnut or pecans
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 3/4 c. pineapple juice
- 3/4 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Place the eggs, pineapple juice, sugar and salt in a saucepan and blend and cook until it boils.
- Cool.

Tomato Shrimp Aspic

Ingredients:
- 2 envelopes Knox gelatine
- 1 c. cold water
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 2 c. hot tomato juice
- 1 can (small) drained shrimp
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/4 c. finely cut onion
- 1/4 c. chopped olives

Directions:
- Sprinkle gelatine over cold water.
- Stir in sugar, salt, lemon juice and hot tomato juice until it's dissolved.
- Add shrimp, celery, onion and olives.
- Pour into mold and leave overnight. When ready to serve, set in hot water for a few seconds and unmold on platter. Arrange salad greens around outside and serve with side dish of salad dressing.

Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 8 potatoes, cubed
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. green pepper, chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped pimento
- 1/2 c. celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Cut potatoes into small cubes and boil until just tender. Drain and add onion, salt and pepper.
- Combine vinegar, 1/3 cup mayonnaise and 2 tablespoons of hot water.
- Add mixture to warm potatoes and let cool.
- Add green peppers, pimento, celery and the other 1/2 cup mayonnaise to potato mixture and mix well.
- Chill.

Shoe Peg Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Shoe Peg corn
- 1 can French-cut green beans
- 1 can garden peas
- 1 small jar pimiento
- 1 c. celery
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 1 c. bell pepper, diced
- 1 tsp. pepper
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. water

Directions:
- Rinse and drain the corn, green beans and garden peas.
- Bring to boil vinegar, sugar, oil, water, salt and pepper.
- Cool.
- Mix with corn, peas and beans and rest of the ingredients. Refrigerate.

Marinated Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh mushrooms
- 1/2 c. cider vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 clove garlic
- 1 bay leaf
- 2 small onions, sliced

Directions:
- Parboil mushrooms.
- Mix other ingredients except onions.
- Pour over parboiled mushrooms and onions.
- Let stand several days (stir occasionally).

Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. frozen peas
- 1 medium head cauliflower
- 3 stalks celery, sliced
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise
- 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt
- 3 to 4 Tbsp. milk

Directions:
- Cook peas according to package directions; drain. While peas cool, break apart cauliflower and slice thin. Combine cauliflower and peas; add celery and onion. Mix together mayonnaise, salt and milk. Mix with the cauliflower mixture. Marinate in refrigerator 6 hours.

Brandied Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. water
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. grated orange peel
- 1/4 c. brandy
- strawberries
- 3 bananas
- oranges
- pineapple
- 2 kiwi

Directions:
- This is good served with the main meal and/or as a dessert.

Rosamarina Salad (Or) Hawaiian Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. rosamarina macaroni (also called orzo)
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 2 eggs, lightly beaten
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 large cans pineapple chunks or tidbits (not crushed)
- 2 small cans mandarin oranges
- 1 large jar maraschino cherries
- 1 bag miniature marshmallows
- 1 (16 oz.) frozen whipped topping, thawed

Directions:
- Rub a wooden bowl with garlic and mix the dressing right in the bowl.
- Use a variety of fresh torn greens such as lettuce, escarole, spinach, endive and watercress.
- Toss well until every leaf is coated with the dressing.

Garlic-Mayonnaise Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 to 10 lb. potatoes
- 3 c. mayonnaise
- 1 small onion
- cilantro (fresh or flakes)
- 1 tsp. garlic powder
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Boil potatoes until fork goes through, but not mashes.
- Let cool.
- Cut up into 1-inch squares.
- Whip up mayonnaise, chopped onion, cilantro (use less if using fresh), garlic powder, salt and pepper.
- Stir in potatoes and mix well to coat.
- Maybe eaten cold or warm.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 qt. cranberries or 4 c.
- 2 c. sugar
- juice of 4 oranges or 4 c. canned orange juice
- 1 pkg. raspberry Jell-O
- 1 pkg. orange Jell-O

Directions:
- Chop cranberries in processor or food chopper.
- Pour 2 cups sugar over cranberries.
- Add the raspberry and orange Jell-O to juice.
- Add to cranberries.
- Mold in pans.

Rancher'S Sunday Chicken

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. fryer chicken parts
- 1 c. prepared Hidden Valley Ranch Original salad dressing
- 4 c. cracker or bread crumbs
- salt
- pepper
- paprika

Directions:
- Wash and dry chicken pieces.
- Dip into prepared salad dressing.
- Spoon crumbs over the dressing to cover.
- Place in foil lined pan.
- Sprinkle with salt, pepper and paprika to taste. Bake uncovered at 375° for 1 1/4 hours.

Pistachio Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (15 1/2 oz.) can undrained crushed pineapple
- 1 box pistachio instant pudding
- 1 1/2 c. small marshmallows
- 1 small can drained fruit cocktail (optional)

Directions:
- Fold in one large container Cool Whip.

Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. crushed pretzels
- 1 stick butter, melted
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix together pretzels, butter and 1/2 cup sugar and put in 5 or 6 cup bowl.
- Cool.
- Mix cream cheese and sugar.
- Fold in Cool Whip. Mix. Pour over pretzels.
- Cool.

Chicken Vegetable Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. corkscrew pasta, cooked and drained
- 1 1/2 c. cooked chicken, that has been cubed
- 1/2 c. sliced ripe olives
- 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 2 c. Italian dressing
- 4 to 5 c. assorted cooked or raw vegetables (such as zucchini, bell peppers, green onions, cherry tomatoes, broccoli, etc.)

Directions:
- Toss all ingredients in a bowl.
- Chill until ready to serve.

Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. spaghetti
- 1 red onion
- 1 green pepper
- 2 cans tomatoes
- 1 (8 oz.) Viva Italian dressing
- 4 Tbsp. Salad Supreme seasoning

Directions:
- Cook spaghetti as directed on box and drain.
- In large bowl, add remaining ingredients with spaghetti.
- Refrigerate.
- Serve cold.

Spinach Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped, frozen spinach
- 1 can water chestnuts, finely chopped
- 1 small shredded carrot
- 1 round loaf pumpernickel bread or Jewish rye bread

Directions:
- Cook the spinach according to box directions.
- Drain well. Mix all other ingredients.
- Hollow the center of the bread so it looks like a bowl.
- Save the bread from the middle.
- Cube into torn bite-size pieces to place around the loaf to use for dip.

Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. grape jello
- 1 can (20 oz.) crushed pineapple
- 1 can blueberry pie filling
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1/2 c. sour cream
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Mix salad well and let congeal.
- Cream sour cream, cream cheese, sugar and vanilla.
- Spread on top of salad.
- Sprinkle top with nuts.

Dinner Party Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 envelope Good Seasons Italian salad dressing mix
- 2 Tbsp. margarine
- 4 chicken breasts, cut into 8 pieces
- 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
- 4 oz. cream cheese
- 1/3 c. white wine

Directions:
- Melt margarine in large skillet.
- Add salad dressing mix.
- Add chicken and brown slowly until golden.
- Place contents of skillet in baking dish.
- Blend soup (undiluted), cream cheese and wine until smooth.
- Spread over chicken.
- Bake, uncovered, 1 hour at 325°.
- Serve over rice.
- Serves 4 to 6.

Sawdust Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 1/4 c. cold water
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. vanilla
- 6 tsp. flour
- 2 c. unsweetened pineapple juice
- 3 bananas, sliced
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 (10 oz.) bag miniature marshmallows
- 1 envelope Dream Whip
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Using a large serving bowl or 9 x 13-inch glass dish, prepare the Jell-O with the boiling water and 1 1/4 cups cold water.
- Add the drained pineapple. Chill until firm.

Pimento Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. orange Jell-O
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 glasses pimento cheese spread
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, undrained
- 2 pkg. dessert topping mix (Dream Whip)

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in boiling water. Cool until syrupy and beat in cheese spread and pineapple.
- Let congeal to syrupy stage and fold in prepared dessert topping mix.
- Refrigerate until set.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. orange Jell-O
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 pkg. fresh cranberries
- 1 seedless orange
- juice of 2 oranges
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. pecans, chopped

Directions:
- Pour hot water over Jell-O.
- When dissolved, add sugar.
- Cut orange in pieces with peelings and put in blender with cranberries and orange juice.
- Blend.
- Combine all ingredients and chill in refrigerator overnight.

Spicy Bean Salsa With Tortilla Chips

Ingredients:
- 1 (15 1/2 oz.) can black-eyed peas, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can black beans, drained
- 1 (15 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained
- 1/2 c. chopped onions
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. finely chopped jalapeno peppers
- 1 (14 1/2 oz.) can fresh-cut diced tomatoes (undrained)
- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle Italian salad dressing
- tortilla chips

Directions:
- In a large bowl, combine all ingredients except tortilla chips; mix well. Cover and refrigerate several hours or overnight to blend flavors. Serve with tortilla chips as an appetizer. May also serve as a side dish. Makes 12 servings.

Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large container Cool Whip
- 1 can chunk pineapple
- 1 can fruit cocktail
- 2 pkg. pistachio instant pudding and pie filling

Directions:
- Beat pudding mix with juices you drain off fruit.
- Mix in fruit and Cool Whip.
- Refrigerate.

Layered Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 c. chopped lettuce
- 1 c. chopped red cabbage
- 2 c. chopped tomatoes
- 1 large can water chestnuts, sliced
- 1 large green pepper, sliced
- 1 large red onion, sliced
- cauliflower (pull apart)
- broccoli (pull apart)
- 1 can sweet peas

Directions:
- Place lettuce in a 3-quart glass dish. Top lettuce with tomatoes (make layers). Next green pepper, red cabbage, water chestnuts, broccoli, red onion, cauliflower.
- Just arrange it colorfully.
- Use your favorite salad dressing.
- Creamy Italian is great.

Tortellini Salad(Great For A Crowd!)  

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. tortellini, cooked, drained and cooled
- 3 cloves garlic, crushed
- 1 red onion, diced
- 1 white onion, diced
- 1 red pepper, diced
- 1 green pepper, diced
- 3 stalks celery, chopped
- 1 large jar artichoke hearts
- 1 large can black olives
- 1 can garbanzo beans
- 1 can kidney beans
- 3/4 c. red wine vinegar
- 1 c. olive oil
- 1 bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Add all ingredients.
- Toss and marinate at least 2 hours.
- Add avocado or mushrooms if you like.

German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 slices bacon
- 1 small Bermuda onion, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 2/3 c. white vinegar
- 1 1/3 c. water
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 6 c. sliced, cooked potatoes

Directions:
- Boil red potatoes with skins on.
- Peel after cooked and set aside.
- Fry bacon until crisp.
- Drain on paper towel.
- Reserve 2 to 3 tablespoons drippings of bacon grease.
- Crumble the bacon. Saute onion in bacon grease until tender.
- Blend in flour slowly, then stir in vinegar and water.
- Cook until mixture boils and becomes thicker.
- Add sugar, salt and pepper; simmer 10 minutes.

Cottage Cheese Salad Ring

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. carton cottage cheese
- 1 small pkg. lime-flavored gelatin
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1 c. green pepper, diced

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin in hot water.
- Chill until partially set. Blend in mayonnaise.
- Fold in celery, green pepper and cottage cheese.
- Pour into a 4-cup ring mold.
- Chill until firm.
- Unmold on lettuce.

Pistachio Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. instant pistachio pudding
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple and juice
- 1 (12 oz.) small curd creamed cottage cheese
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. finely chopped maraschino cherries

Directions:
- Mix all together and let stand overnight before serving.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small cans crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can Ocean Spray cranberry sauce (with whole berries)
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 large box cherry Jell-O
- 2 chopped apples

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O according to package directions, then add remaining ingredients. Pour into Jell-O mold or bowl and chill until set.

Frozen Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 envelope unflavored gelatin, soaked in 1/2 c. cold water
- 1 can apricots, drained and chopped
- 1 can peaches, drained and chopped
- 1 can pineapple, crushed
- 2 bananas, cut up
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Soak gelatin in 1/2 cup cold water for five minutes.

Pistachio Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small box instant pistachio pudding
- 1 large can crushed pineapple (undrained)
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 (12 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 1 can Mandarin oranges, cut up (do not use juice)

Directions:
- Combine dry pudding mix, pineapple and juice.
- Fold in marshmallows and nuts.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Refrigerate overnight.

Great Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can French green beans, drained
- 1 can tiny garden peas, drained
- 1 can bean sprouts, drained
- 1/2 c. each chopped: celery, carrots, onions
- 1 head cauliflower, cleaned and broken in chunks
- 1 jar pimento, drained and sliced
- 1 can mushrooms, sliced and drained
- 1/2 c. Mazola oil
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 3/4 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix oil, vinegar and sugar. Mix with vegetables. Marinate overnight.	Add lemon pepper and celery; salt to taste.
- Can use less oil. Add enough water to make 1/2 cup.

French Roll Pizzas(Snack Or Meal)  

Ingredients:
- 1 (9 oz.) block Cheddar cheese or preferred cheese
- 1 large can mushrooms
- 1 large can tomato sauce
- 2 cans sliced olives
- 1 chopped onion
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- sourdough bread rolls, cut in half the longway

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and let sit to blend.
- Spread on sourdough bread halves.
- Bake in oven at 325° until cheese is melted and bread is crispy.

Jello Pineapple Cottage Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) lemon jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 1/2 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 1/2 c. cottage cheese
- mayonnaise
- lettuce

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Drain pineapple and reserve juice.
- Add pineapple juice, lemon juice and sugar to jello. Stir.
- Chill until thick, but not firm.
- Fold in crushed pineapple and cottage cheese.
- Pour into bowl and chill until set.
- Unmold onto lettuce.
- Dot with mayonnaise.

Congealed Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. Concord grape jello (black raspberry may be used)
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 can blueberry pie filling
- 1 large can undrained crushed pineapple
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 tsp. vanilla flavoring
- 8 oz. sour cream
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Mix
- jello in boiling water;
- add blueberry pie filling and pineapple.
- Cover and refrigerate overnight.

Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pan cornbread, baked, cooled and crumbled
- green onions
- celery
- radishes
- 1 green pepper
- 1 cucumber, seeds removed

Directions:
- Chop vegetables fine and add to crumbled cornbread.
- Toss with 1/2 large bottle buttermilk dressing.
- Store in refrigerator. (Keeps well up to 1 week.)

Scott'S Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. potatoes
- 1 c. Italian dressing
- 1 small onion, diced
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- 1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper
- 1 tsp. paprika
- mayonnaise to suit

Directions:
- Peel and slice boiled potatoes.
- Pour Italian dressing over potatoes and allow to sit 1 hour.
- Pour off excess dressing and add eggs, onion and spices.
- Add mayonnaise until desired consistency is obtained.
- Serve immediately or chilled.

Pineapple Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 2/3 c. pineapple juice
- 2/3 c. water
- 1 small pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 2/3 c. finely shredded carrots
- 2/3 c. drained crushed pineapple
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2/3 c. milk

Directions:
- Heat the pineapple juice and water to boiling.
- Stir in the lemon Jell-O until dissolved.
- Cool to room temperature. Meanwhile, mix the cream cheese until light and fluffy.
- Heat milk and add to cheese.
- Mix until well blended.
- Then add carrots, pineapple and vinegar; put the Jell-O mixture into the cheese and mix well.
- Pour into container and chill.

Ceilia'S Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 lb. red potatoes
- 2 stalks celery, diced
- 1 small onion, diced
- 4 sprigs parsley, diced
- 1/2 tsp. dill
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 oz. lemon juice
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Cook, peel and dice potatoes.
- Add diced celery, onion, parsley and dill.
- Add mayonnaise; mix.
- Then add lemon juice and salt and pepper to taste.

The Bungalow'S French Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1 c. vinegar
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1 tsp. grated onion
- 1 tsp. horseradish
- 1 tsp. paprika

Directions:
- Put all ingredients in a jar; shake well.
- Cover tightly and refrigerate.

Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 cans Niblets corn
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 1 bell pepper, finely chopped
- 1 small jar pimiento
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1/4 c. salad oil

Directions:
- Mix and marinate overnight.
- Drain and serve on lettuce.

Favorite Muffins

Ingredients:
- 1 egg
- 1/2 c. milk
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 1/2 c. Gold Medal flour
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 tsp. baking powder
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Heat oven to 400°.
- Grease bottoms and sides of 12 medium muffin tins.
- Beat egg; stir in milk and oil.
- Mix in remaining ingredients just until flour is moistened.
- Batter should be lumpy.
- Fill muffin cups
- 2/3 full.
- Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until golden brown.
- Immediately remove from pan.
- If using self-rising flour, omit baking powder and salt.

7-Up Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drain and save juice
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 (1 lb.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (7 oz.) 7-Up
- 1 (10 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1/2 c. pecan pieces

Directions:
- Drain pineapple and save juice.
- Add water to make 1 cup liquid.
- Heat to boiling and add jello to dissolve.
- Cool.
- Stir in 7-Up.
- Refrigerate to partially set.
- Mix in pineapple and cranberries.
- Pour into dish to congeal.
- Mix cream cheese and Cool Whip and spread on top.
- Sprinkle with pecan pieces.

Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 to 8 medium potatoes
- 1 pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
- fully cooked chopped ham, chopped into small squares and fry
- 2 to 3 chopped green onions
- mayonnaise or sour cream

Directions:
- Cut up potatoes as you would for potato salad. Boil your potatoes, then drain. Let your potatoes cool 5 to 10 minutes. In a large deep serving dish, cover slightly the bottom with a layer of your cooked potatoes. Then spread a light thin layer of mayonnaise or sour cream or a half and half mixture of mayonnaise and sour cream mixture over the top of your potatoes. Then sprinkle with green peppers, Cheddar cheese and chopped ham. Sprinkle with salt and pepper.

Easy Chicken In Wine

Ingredients:
- 3 or 4 whole chicken breasts, cut in halves
- 1 c. Burgundy wine
- 1/4 c. soy sauce
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1 tsp. powdered ginger
- 1/4 tsp. oregano leaves, crushed
- 1 Tbsp. brown sugar

Directions:
- Place chicken breasts in one layer in a shallow baking pan. Mix together all other ingredients.
- Pour sauce over chicken. Cover with foil. Refrigerate. Spoon sauce over chicken a couple of times.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch broccoli (flowerets only)
- 1/2 c. chopped onions
- 1/2 lb. cooked bacon
- 1/2 large (16 oz.) bottle Ranch dressing

Directions:
- Chop washed broccoli and drain on paper towels.
- Add onions. Crumble bacon.
- Reserve 1/4 cup and add to broccoli.
- Add Ranch dressing and mix well.
- Top with remaining bacon bits.

Raw Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium head cauliflower
- 3 celery stalks, finely sliced
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, slightly cooked
- 1 onion, grated
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Trim and wash cauliflower and break into small flowerets. Combine all ingredients.
- Toss lightly and chill well.

Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 1/2 c. boiling water
- 1 small pkg. frozen strawberries
- 2 bananas, chopped
- 1/2 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 small container Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add strawberries and stir until thawed.
- Add bananas and nuts.
- Pour 1/2 mixture into long dish and put in refrigerator until firm.
- Combine pineapple and Cool Whip and spread on layer.
- Top with remaining mixture. Refrigerate until firm.

Budget Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 small can coconut
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 2 1/2 tsp. cinnamon
- 2 c. flour
- 1 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained slightly
- 4 eggs

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in mixer and beat until mixed well, approximately 2 minutes.
- Pour into two 9-inch cake pans that have been greased and floured.
- Bake at 325° for 35 minutes. Cool before icing with cream cheese frosting.

Pumpkin Loaves

Ingredients:
- 3 c. flour
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 1 tsp. cinnamon
- 1 tsp. nutmeg
- 1 tsp. ground cloves
- 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 2/3 c. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 3 eggs
- 1 (16 oz.) can pumpkin (2 c.)
- 1 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Grease two 9 x 5-inch loaf pans.
- Mix all dry ingredients thoroughly.
- Add remaining ingredients and mix just until blended.
- Turn batter into pans.
- Bake about 1 hour or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.
- Clean in pans 10 minutes; remove from pans and cool completely.

Frozen Fruit Salad No. 1

Ingredients:
- 1 large can crushed pineapple, drained
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 10 oz. frozen strawberries
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 banana
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. mini marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Cover and freeze.
- Serve frozen.
- Keeps well in refrigerator.

Hot Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large cans chunk pineapple, drained well
- 1 1/4 c. sugar
- 6 Tbsp. flour
- 8 Tbsp. pineapple juice
- 1 1/2 c. grated sharp cheese
- 1 1/2 c. Ritz crackers
- 1/2 stick oleo, melted

Directions:
- Mix together first 5 ingredients.
- Place in 9 x 13-inch pan. Top with finely crushed crackers and melted oleo.
- Bake at 375° until cheese melts and mixture is bubbly.
- Serve warm.

Layered Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce, broken in bite size pieces
- 1 bunch celery, chopped
- 1 medium onion, chopped
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1 bell pepper, sliced
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen sweet peas
- 1 pt. jar mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- grated cheese (Cheddar)
- 1 jar Hormel real bacon bits

Directions:
- Mix together the mayonnaise and sugar in a small bowl and set aside.
- Layer the first 6 items in order listed, then spread mayonnaise mixture over top, sealing edges.
- Sprinkle cheese and bacon bits over the top.
- Refrigerate and let sit overnight.

Surprise Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1- 12 oz. carton whipped topping, thawed
- 2 red apples, cubed
- 2 green apples, cubed
- 4 Snickers bars, cut into 1/2 inch pieces

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Cover and chill. Store in refrigerator.

Cucumber And Green Onion Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cream cheese
- 1 tsp. salad dressing
- 1 tsp. white vinegar
- 1 medium cucumber
- 3 to 4 green onions

Directions:
- Wash and dry cucumber and onions.
- Chop very fine.
- For each package of cream cheese you use, add cucumber and green onions.

Watergate Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 9 oz. Cool Whip
- 1 pkg. instant pistachio pudding
- 3 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 can fruit cocktail, drained
- coconut flakes
- chopped nuts
- cherries

Directions:
- In a large bowl, add pineapple (with juice) and pudding; mix well.
- Add fruit cocktail and marshmallows.
- Fold in Cool Whip. Put in a pretty glass bowl and top with coconut, chopped nuts and cherries.

Bermuda Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1/2 c. tarragon vinegar
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1/2 large Bermuda onion, thinly sliced and separated into rings
- 1/2 c. crumbled Roquefort or Blue cheese
- 1 small head cauliflower, separated into florets
- 1/3 c. sliced stuffed olives
- 1 small head lettuce, shredded

Directions:
- Combine first 5 ingredients in a jar; shake well.
- Combine cauliflower, onion and olives.
- Marinate in dressing for 1 hour.

Russian Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 10 oz. pkg. frozen peas
- 1/4 c. sour cream
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 Tbsp. bacon bits
- 1 small onion, sliced thin

Directions:
- Thaw peas; add all other ingredients.
- Chill overnight. Serves 6.

Artichoke Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) pkg. rainbow rotini pasta
- 1 (6 oz.) can black olives, drained
- 1 (6 oz.) jar marinated artichoke hearts, cut in half
- 1 1/2 c. celery, diced
- 2 c. Ranch dressing
- 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Cook pasta as directed on the box.
- Drain; rinse with cold water and put in a large bowl.
- Add olives, artichoke hearts, celery, dressing and cheese.
- Season with salt and pepper.
- Toss together.
- Cover and let marinate in refrigerator overnight. Makes 8 servings.

Salad Dressing For Green Vegetables

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. Wesson oil
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/3 c. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 1/2 tsp. black pepper

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients and mix well.
- Use as a dressing for vegetables.

Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 3 eggs, well beaten
- 2 Tbsp. water
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Cook all ingredients on low heat.
- Stir constantly to prevent sticking until thickened.
- Remove from stove.
- Add lump of butter. Cool; ready for use.

German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 lb. salad potatoes
- 1 lb. bacon, cut in small pieces
- 3 heaping Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 c. vinegar (white)
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 c. water
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- Boil potatoes; skin and slice into pieces.
- Fry bacon; drain off all fat.
- Sprinkle flour over bacon; mix it up.
- Pour vinegar, sugar and water over bacon.
- Simmer until thick.
- Pour over potatoes; mix well.
- Serve warm.

Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped sweet pickle
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 6 c. cooked macaroni, chilled
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. buttermilk
- 1/2 tsp. prepared mustard
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Combine eggs, celery, green pepper, pickles and chilled macaroni.
- Blend mayonnaise, buttermilk and mustard.
- Fold into macaroni mixture.
- Season with salt and pepper.

Chuck Wagon Western Bean Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. ground beef
- 1 lb. can pork and beans
- 1 lb. can spaghetti in tomato sauce
- 1 tsp. mustard
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. ketchup
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Combine meat, onion and pepper in skillet and brown; drain off grease.
- Add other ingredients.
- Put in a covered 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.
- Bake at 350° for 40 minutes.
- This is a delicious meal with bread and a salad!
- So easy!

Dressing For Fresh Fruit

Ingredients:
- 1/3 c. honey
- 1/4 tsp. grated lime peel
- 3 Tbsp. lime juice
- 1 1/2 tsp. poppy seed
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. ground nutmeg

Directions:
- Beat all above together at medium speed.
- Constantly continue beating while gradually adding 1/4 cup salad oil.
- Cover and chill.
- If it becomes too thick, let stand at room temperature. Use over fresh fruit and walnuts.

Marinated Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh mushroom buttons (small)
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1/3 c. red wine vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 3 tsp. chopped chives
- 1 tsp. tarragon
- 1 small clove garlic, chopped
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. sugar

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in a deep dish or jar so liquid will cover mushrooms.
- Chill overnight.
- Drain and serve.

Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 Tbsp. grated onion
- dash of cayenne pepper
- 1/2 c. oil (olive and salad)
- 1/3 c. catsup
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- juice of 1 lemon

Directions:
- Combine and beat well with rotary beater.

Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can green peas, drained
- 2 boiled eggs, diced
- 1/4 c. dill or sweet pickles
- 1 small onion, diced
- celery, chopped (optional)
- pimento (for color, optional)
- mayo

Directions:
- Mix all together.
- This is really good with turkey or ham.

Blueberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. fresh blueberries
- 2 c. hot water
- 1 large box grape or black cherry Jell-O
- 1 small can crushed pineapple (juice also)

Directions:
- Mix all of the ingredients. Let congeal.

Diabetic Salad Dressing(Diabetic Recipe)  

Ingredients:
- plain low-fat yogurt
- lemon juice or relish
- Equal sugar substitute

Directions:
- Mix low-fat yogurt and lemon juice or relish together.
- Add Equal to taste; mix well.

Sour Cream Dip

Ingredients:
- 2 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 2 Tbsp. chopped fresh dill
- 1 Tbsp. chopped chives
- 1 Tbsp. chopped parsley

Directions:
- Mix ingredients together.
- Season to taste with salt and pepper.
- Chill overnight.
- Serve with raw vegetables.

Baked Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. crushed potato chips
- 2/3 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
- 4 c. chopped, cooked chicken
- 2 c. chopped celery
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 pimentos, chopped
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced

Directions:
- Mix potato chips and cheese in bowl.
- Combine half the cheese mixture with next 9 ingredients, mixing well.
- Spoon into shallow 1 1/2-quart baking dish.
- Arrange egg slices on top.
- Sprinkle with remaining cheese mixture.
- Chill for several hours.
- Bake at 400° for 25 minutes or until heated through.
- Makes 8 to 9 servings.

Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 tomato, chopped
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 bunch green onions, sliced thin
- 2 cans shoe peg corn, drained
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Stir all ingredients together, chill; serve.

Marinated Shrimp Kabobs

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. large unpeeled fresh shrimp
- 1 (15 oz.) can pineapple chunks (undrained)
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle Italian salad dressing
- 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1 Tbsp. brown sugar
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1 medium-size green pepper, cut into 1-inch cubes
- hot cooked rice

Directions:
- Peel and devein shrimp; set aside.
- Drain pineapple chunks, reserving 1/4 cup juice.
- Set pineapple aside.

Pea-Peanut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. frozen peas
- 1 can Spanish peanuts
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 Tbsp. salad dressing

Directions:
- Cook peas according to directions.
- Cool.
- Measure and add equal amount of peanuts.
- Mix thoroughly with sour cream and salad dressing.
- Chill before serving.

Appetizer Oyster Crackers

Ingredients:
- 1 (1.0 oz.) pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch salad dressing mix
- 1/2 tsp. dill weed
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 5 c. (11 oz.) plain oyster crackers
- 1/4 tsp. lemon pepper (optional)
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder (optional)

Directions:
- Combine Ranch salad dressing mix with dill weed and oil.
- Pour over crackers; stir to coat.
- Place in warm oven (250°) for 15 to 20 minutes.
- Stir gently halfway through baking.
- Serves 6.

Crunchy Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 1/2 c. chopped, cooked chicken
- 3 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. sweet pickles, cubed
- 1 c. chopped pecans, toasted
- 1 c. seedless green grapes, halved
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and chopped
- 1 (8 oz.) can pineapple tidbits, drained and chopped
- 1/2 c. pimento-stuffed olives, chopped
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 (2 oz.) jar diced pimento, drained
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients; blend well.
- Chill.
- Serve on lettuce cups or use for sandwiches.

Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large cans pineapple tidbits
- 1 small bag miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 c. sugar
- 6 Tbsp. flour
- 2 eggs
- 2 c. pineapple juice

Directions:
- Mix sugar and flour.
- Beat together eggs and juice, add to dry mixture and cook in double boiler until thick.
- Stir constantly. Cool.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 pkg. cranberries
- 1 pkg. marshmallows (miniature)
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 c. whipping cream

Directions:
- Chop up cranberries.
- Put 1 cup sugar over them and let sit overnight. Next day add marshmallows, pineapple and nuts.
- Fold in whipped cream when ready to serve.

Marinated Roast Cookout

Ingredients:
- 1 tablespoon dried minced garlic
- 1/2 teaspoon black pepper
- 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves
- 1/2 cup red wine vinegar
- 1/2 cup salad oil
- 3 to 6 pound sirloin tip roast

Directions:
- Mix first 5 ingredients and pour over roast in glass dish.
- Let marinate for 6 to 8 hours at room temperature or overnight in refrigerator plus two hours at room temperature.
- Cook to desired doneness on outdoor grill, 1-1/2 hours for rare, 2 hours for medium or 2 -1/2 hours for well done.
- Serves 8-12.

Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can chunky mixed fruit
- 1 can chunk pineapple
- 1 can mandarin oranges
- 1 pkg. instant French vanilla pudding

Directions:
- Mix all together.
- Let set overnight in Frigidaire.

Oven French Fries(Dietetic)  

Ingredients:
- 2 large potatoes
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- salt, pepper and paprika

Directions:
- Slice potatoes in half and then slice each half into 8 thick crescent-shaped pieces.
- Chill sliced potatoes 10 minutes (or longer) in ice cold water to crisp them.
- Preheat oven to 475°. Drain potatoes well.
- Toss lightly with oil.
- Spray a baking pan with Pam.
- Arrange the slices in a single layer.
- Bake 25 minutes turning occasionally.
- Season and serve.
- Makes 4 (75 calorie) servings.

Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium size container cottage cheese
- 4 1/2 c. serving size orange jello
- 1 (9 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 can mandarin orange slices, drained

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Chill in refrigerator for a couple of hours.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. water
- 1 pkg. fresh cranberries
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cherry Jell-O
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 1/2 c. celery, fine chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Cook sugar and water.
- Add cranberries.
- Simmer for 10 minutes.
- Dissolve Jell-O in hot water, then add cranberry mixture and pineapple and chill slightly.
- Fold in celery and nuts.
- Put in 5-cup mold or 9 x 9-inch square dish.

Pineapple Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. orange jello
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 2 cans mandarin oranges
- 1 pt. whipped cream
- nuts

Directions:
- Mix jello according to directions. Add pineapple and oranges (drain both).
- Chill until set.
- Top with whipped cream.
- Sprinkle nuts on top.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch broccoli, cut into small pieces
- 1/2 lb. bacon, fried crispy and broken into small pieces
- walnuts (if desired)
- 1 small onion, sliced very thin
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/4 c. wine vinegar

Directions:
- Combine the broccoli, bacon, walnuts (if desired), onion, salt and pepper to taste.
- Blend the mayonnaise, sugar and wine vinegar.
- Pour over the broccoli mixture. Stir until all pieces are coated.

Buttermilk Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. peach gelatin
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 2 c. buttermilk
- 1 large (13 oz.) Cool Whip

Directions:
- Heat pineapple and juice until hot; but not boiling. Remove from heat and add dry gelatin. Mix well. Stir in buttermilk and fold in Cool Whip. Place in 13 x 9 dish and refrigerate until set, congealed.

5-Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. shredded coconut
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. sour cream (8 oz.)
- 1 can drained pineapple tidbits
- 1 c. drained mandarin oranges

Directions:
- Mix and refrigerate for several hours or overnight.

Frosted Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (13 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 (7 oz.) bottle ginger ale
- 1 can cranberry sauce
- 1 (2 oz.) pkg. Dream Whip, make per instructions on box
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, room temperature
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Drain pineapple.
- Reserve juice and make up to one cup with water.
- Heat to boiling; dissolve jello in hot liquid.
- Gently stir in ginger ale; chill until partially set.
- Mix pineapple and the cranberry sauce; fold into jello.
- Turn into 9 x 9 x 2-inch dish and chill until firm.
- Mix cream cheese and whipped topping; spread over jello and sprinkle nuts on top.

Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 large Delicious apples
- 1 c. seedless red grapes
- 1 c. seedless green grapes
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1/4 c. peanut butter
- 3 bananas
- 3/4 c. walnuts
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar

Directions:
- Dice apples, cut grapes in half and slice bananas.
- Mix together; stir in marshmallows, walnuts, sugar, peanut butter and mayonnaise.
- Makes a delicious summer salad.

Old Timey Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 medium potatoes
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 or 2 eggs
- 1 medium onion, minced
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- pinch of sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- salt and pepper

Directions:
- Take Irish potatoes.
- Peel and wash and chop small.
- Put a small amount of salt in the water you boil them in.
- Cook until real tender.
- Drain water off and break eggs in the hot potatoes. Mash real good, the hot potatoes will cook the eggs.
- Add onion (chopped fine), mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Stir all this up real good and taste to see if it's flavored to suit your taste.

Taco Dip

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1/2 jar Chi-Chi's salsa

Directions:
- Mix both together until smooth.
- On a small platter or something flat, break up lettuce small; chop tomatoes small and sprinkle shredded cheese on top.
- Dip Fritos chips into dip, then scoop up salad.
- Good!

Chicken Salad Casserole

Ingredients:
- 2 cans cream of chicken soup
- 2 Tbsp. chopped onion
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 4 c. cubed, cooked chicken
- 2 c. cooked rice
- 1 1/2 c. diced celery
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- Italian style bread crumbs
- salt and pepper (if desired)

Directions:
- Mix together soup, onion, mayonnaise and lemon juice.
- Add chicken, rice, celery and eggs; toss lightly.
- Put mixture in 9 x 13-inch baking dish; top with bread crumbs.
- Bake for 40 minutes at 350°.

10 Day Slaw

Ingredients:
- 1 average head cabbage
- 2 medium onions, sliced
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 c. salad oil
- 1 c. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. celery seed
- 2 Tbsp. salt
- 1 c. white sugar

Directions:
- Chop or shred cabbage.
- Add sliced onions and chopped green peppers.
- Pour white sugar over cabbage mixture and let stand while mixing dressing.
- Heat oil, vinegar, celery seed and salt to a rolling boil.
- Pour immediately over cabbage.
- Store in refrigerator.
- Keeps 10 days.

Spaghetti Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. spaghetti, cooked and drained
- 1 medium onion, diced
- 1 medium green pepper, diced
- 1 medium tomato, chopped
- 3-4 stalks celery, chopped
- 1/2 bottle Italian dressing
- 1/2 bottle McCormick Salad Supreme

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in large bowl.
- Set over night or for several hours in the refrigerator.
- Eat cold.

Broccoli Raisin Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh broccoli
- 1/3 c. raisins
- 2 Tbsp. onion
- 2 slices bacon, cooked
- 3 oz. cream cheese
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. white vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- 1 Tbsp. mustard
- 1 clove garlic

Directions:
- Rinse broccoli well and cut flowerets into bite-size pieces. Toss with raisins, onion and crisp bacon pieces.
- Combine cream cheese and remaining ingredients in blender.
- Pour over broccoli. Mix well.
- Serve well chilled.

Carrot Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. carrots
- 1 can tomato soup
- 1 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1 green pepper, finely chopped
- 1 onion, sliced very thin and separated into rings

Directions:
- Slice carrots and cook in salted water only until barely tender.
- (Do not overcook.)
- Drain.
- Combine soup, sugar, vinegar and seasonings; blend well and slowly add salad oil while beating until well mixed.
- Add to vegetables and let set overnight in refrigerator.

Tuna Noodle Casserole

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. (3 c.) medium noodles
- 1 (6 1/2 or 7 oz.) can tuna, drained and flaked
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/3 c. onion, chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped pepper
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1 can condensed celery soup
- 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded sharp American cheese

Directions:
- Cook noodles according to directions on package.
- Drain.
- Stir in tuna, celery, mayonnaise, onion, green pepper and salt.
- In saucepan, combine soup and milk; heat through.
- Add cheese.
- Heat and stir until cheese melts.
- Add to noodle mixture.
- Turn into 2-quart casserole.
- Bake, uncovered, in a 425° oven for 20 minutes.
- Makes 6 servings.

Low-Fat Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 to 6 large potatoes, cooked, cooled and cubed
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. sliced radish
- 1 small cucumber, diced
- 1 small green pepper, diced
- 1/2 c. skim milk
- 1 c. Kraft-Free mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. yellow mustard
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. pepper
- 1 tsp. celery seed

Directions:
- Combine veggies in a large bowl.
- Mix together mayonnaise, mustard, milk, salt, pepper and celery seed.
- Mix until smooth. Pour over veggies and toss to coat.
- Chill (overnight is best.) The dressing should be a pale yellow color and slightly thin.

Quick "N" Hearty Mushroom Soup

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced or 2 cans mushrooms (6 to 8 oz. each)
- salad oil
- 1 lb. hamburger
- 1 can whole tomatoes, crushed
- 1 can (10 3/4 oz. size) beef broth
- 2 soup cans water
- 2 tsp. onion powder
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1/2 tsp. thyme
- 1/2 c. Minute rice

Directions:
- Saute mushrooms in a little oil; set aside.
- Brown hamburger, draining off fat.
- Add tomatoes, mushroom mix, broth, water and seasonings.
- Bring to boil.
- Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes.
- Stir in rice and cover.
- Set aside for 5 minutes. Makes 9 cups.

5 Cup Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. shredded coconut
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained

Directions:
- Blend all ingredients; chill and serve.

Dishpan Cookies

Ingredients:
- 2 c. brown sugar
- 2 tsp. vanilla
- 4 eggs
- 2 c. white sugar
- 2 c. salad oil
- 4 c. flour
- 2 tsp. baking soda
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 1/2 c. oats
- 4 c. corn flakes

Directions:
- Cream together first 5 ingredients.
- Add flour, soda and salt to mixture.
- Fold in oats, then corn flakes.
- Bake at 350° for 7 to 8 minutes.
- Makes 100 (2 1/2-inch) cookies.
- "A dishpan full!"

Mixed Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. diced pineapple
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. mandarin oranges, canned and drained
- 1 c. Angel Flake coconut
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Let stand in refrigerator.

German-Style New Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. tiny new potatoes
- 2 c. torn lettuce
- 1 c. torn curly endive
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 1/4 c. thinly sliced radishes
- 3 Tbsp. sliced green onion with tops
- 6 slices bacon
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. seasoned salt
- 1/4 tsp. celery seed
- 1/8 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Peel strip around center of each potato.
- Cook potatoes in boiling water.
- Drain.
- Halve any large potatoes.
- In bowl, combine cooked potatoes, lettuce, curly endive, eggs, radishes and green onion.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches fresh broccoli
- 1 lb. bacon, fried crisp
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Cut broccoli; do not cook.
- Mix in bacon, onion and cheese. Mix together mayo, sugar and vinegar and pour over broccoli. Chill.
- Serves 6 to 8.

Cranberry And Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. cherry flavored gelatin
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 1 1/4 c. hot water
- 1 1/2 c. cranberry sauce
- 2 c. chopped apples
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatin and salt in hot water.
- Break up cranberry sauce with fork.
- Add the gelatin mixture; chill until thickened. Fold in apples and nuts.

Crawfish Casserole

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. yellow rice (1/2 box)
- 1 lb. crawfish tails
- 1 stick margarine
- 1 chopped bell pepper
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 8 oz. grated cheese
- 1 can Ro-Tel tomatoes
- 1 chopped onion

Directions:
- Saute celery, bell pepper and onion in margarine.
- Combine with tomatoes and steam on low fire.
- Mix in soup.
- Cook rice according to directions.
- Mix rice with tomato-soup mixture.
- Add grated cheese and crawfish.
- Bake at 350° about 40 minutes or until bubbling.
- Don't stir.
- Enjoy with salad and French bread. Serves 8.

Miracle Whip-Up

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. lean ground beef
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 30 oz. jar of your favorite spaghetti sauce
- 7 oz. pkg. macaroni, cooked
- 1/4 to 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated

Directions:
- Brown and cook the ground beef.
- Add the salad dressing, spaghetti sauce, and cooked macaroni.
- Heat on medium heat.
- Top with grated Cheddar cheese.
- Serves 4 to 6.

Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box pistachio pudding
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple and juice, chilled
- 1/2 c. nuts
- 1 (9 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1 1/2 c. mini marshmallows

Directions:
- Sprinkle pudding over pineapple.
- Add other ingredients and stir together.

Favorite Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle French salad dressing
- 1 envelope onion soup mix
- 8 (4 oz.) boneless skinless chicken breast halves
- 4 c. hot cooked rice

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 325°. Combine cranberry sauce, dressing and soup mix in small mixing bowl and mix well. Spread half the cranberry mixture over bottom of 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Arrange chicken in single layer over prepared layer. Top with remaining cranberry mixture. Bake 30 to 45 minutes until chicken is cooked through. Serve over rice. Yield: 8 servings.

Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cooked chicken
- 12 c. cooked rice (6 c. wild rice and 6 c. plain rice)
- 2 bunches green onion
- 1 c. celery, chopped
- 1 box frozen baby peas, thawed but not cooked
- 2 c. drained mandarin oranges
- 1 c. raisins
- 1/2 c. cashews or peanuts

Directions:
- Combine all and add dressing as much as desired.
- There may be too much dressing for this recipe.
- Refrigerate overnight.

Snow Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. pecans (broken)
- 26 marshmallows (large)
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 large pkg. cream cheese
- 4 c. boiling water
- 1 large pkg. lime gelatin

Directions:
- Drop marshmallows in boiling water, dissolve well.
- Add jello and cool.
- Add pineapple to cheese and mix well, then add to cooled gelatin mixture.
- Add whipped cream and nuts, pour into large pan, 8 x 14-inch, chill well and serve.
- May use a large jello mold.

Polly Smith'S Pistachio Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. pistachio pudding
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts
- 1/2 c. maraschino cherries
- 1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip
- 1 large (1 lb.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- Mix the pudding and pineapple.
- Add remaining ingredients and blend everything together.
- Refrigerate until cold.

Artichoke, Potato And Bacon Salad With Fennel Flowers

Ingredients:
- 6 artichoke hearts
- 1 lb. new potatoes
- 6 to 8 slices bacon, fried crisp
- 1 small onion
- 1/4 c. olive oil
- 3 or 4 fennel flowers with stalks 6 to 8-inches long
- juice of 1/2 lemon or 1/2 c. cider vinegar
- salt and pepper
- 1/2 each: large red, yellow and green bell peppers

Directions:
- Wash and cook potatoes just until tender.
- Cut onion lengthways into quarters and cut thinly crosswise.
- Soak in cold water.
- Cut peppers into strips, 1/4 x 1-inch long.
- Cut artichokes in half.
- Slice artichokes crosswise in 1/4-inch slices.

Hot Chicken, Shrimp Or Crab Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 cooked chicken, boned and cut up or 1 pound raw shrimp, cooked and peeled, or 1 pound crabmeat
- 2 cups thinly sliced celery
- 1/2 cup cashews (optional)
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 small onion, grated
- 1 cup mayonnaise
- 2 tablespoons lemon juice
- 1/2 cup grated cheese
- 1/2 cup crushed potato chips

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except cheese and potato chips; put in casserole.
- Combine cheese and potato chips and sprinkle on top. Bake at 350 degrees until hot, 25 to 30 minutes.
- Serves 4 to 6.

Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 c. cooked chicken breasts, shredded
- 4 c. celery, chopped (use only 2 c. if preferred)
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 c. slivered almonds, toasted
- 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
- potato chips (for the top)

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Mix all ingredients, except cheese and chips. Put in a 13 x 9 casserole dish and top with cheese and chips. Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 large bunches broccoli
- 1 c. salad dressing
- 3/4 c. raisins
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 9 slices bacon, fried or use a whole lb.

Directions:
- Mix together dressing, vinegar and sugar.
- Pour over other ingredients.
- Recipe can easily be doubled.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 lb. fresh cranberries, grind and add a little rind
- 1 small orange, grind and add a little rind
- 2 pkg. lemon jello mixed with 2 1/2 c. hot water
- 3/4 c. sugar
- dash of salt
- small can crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Mix together and chill.

7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- lettuce, torn in bite size pieces
- 1 medium onion, chopped or sliced (purple or green)
- 1 pkg. frozen green peas, uncooked
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 to 1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Layer lettuce, onion, peas and eggs. Sprinkle with bacon.
- Ice top with mayonnaise.
- Sprinkle top with shredded cheese.

Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bags spinach
- 1 can French fried onion rings
- 1 red onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
- 3 to 4 boiled eggs
- 1 can tomato soup
- 3/4 c. oil
- 3/4 c. red wine vinegar
- 1 tsp. dry powder mustard
- salt and pepper to taste

Directions:
- This makes a very large salad.

Italian Beef

Ingredients:
- 3 to 5 lb. beef rump roast
- 1 small jar salad pepperoncini
- 2 Tbsp. Italian spices

Directions:
- Remove string from around roast and discard.
- Place roast in roasting pan.
- Pour liquid from jar of peppers over roast.
- Remove stems from peppers and discard.
- Do not discard seeds.
- Chop peppers and sprinkle over roast.
- Place in warm oven (200°) before bedtime or in early A.M.

Auntie'S Green Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can French-style green beans, drained
- 1 can English peas, drained
- 1 sliced onion (sliced as you would for onion rings)
- 1 jar chopped pimentos
- 1 sliced bell pepper
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. Wesson oil

Directions:
- Mix sugar, vinegar and oil.
- Pour over vegetables.
- Cover and place in refrigerator.
- This salad will keep for weeks and improves with age.

Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple (with juices)
- 1 pkg. pistachio pudding
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. cashews
- cherries

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together by hand.
- Decorate top with cherries and crushed cashews

Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. macaroni
- 2 cut up tomatoes
- 1 small cut onion
- 1/2 c. green peppers, cut
- 6 slices cheese
- 2 to 3 pickle slices
- 2 Tbsp. pickle juice
- 3 to 4 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 c. vinegar
- celery seed
- seasoned peppers

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; drain and cool.
- Add tomatoes, onion, peppers, cheese and pickle juice.
- Mix.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Add celery seed and seasoned peppers to taste.

Green Bean Relish

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh or frozen green beans
- 1/3 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. paprika
- 6 small onions
- 1 large lemon
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Slice beans in thin slivers. Cook 5 minutes. Cool. Cut onions in thin slices. Add beans along with mixture of salad oil, lemon juice, salt, sugar, pepper and paprika. Chill in refrigerator several hours to develop flavor. Serve as salad or relish.

Chicken Crescent Casserole

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cooked chicken, cut in pieces
- 1 can cream of chicken soup
- 1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained
- 1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
- 2/3 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. chopped onion or 2 Tbsp. minced onions
- 1/2 c. sour cream
- 1 (8 oz.) can refrigerated crescent dinner rolls
- 2/3 c. (3 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese
- 2 to 4 Tbsp. melted margarine

Directions:
- In a large saucepan, combine the first 8 ingredients. Cook over medium heat until hot and bubbly.
- Place in an 8 x 12-inch ungreased baking dish. Place the refrigerated dinner rolls over hot chicken mixture. Combine the cheese and melted margarine. Spread cheese mixture on rolls. Bake at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes or until crust is golden brown.

Layered Salad(Makes 10 To 12 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 1 small head lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
- 1 (17 oz.) can tiny peas, drained or 1 (10 oz.) frozen peas, thawed
- 1/2 lb. bacon, cooked, drained and crumbled
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 small sour cream
- 1 bunch fresh spinach, torn into bite-size pieces
- 1 can water chestnuts, sliced and drained
- 1/2 c. red onions, sliced thin
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. Parmesan cheese, grated

Directions:
- Place lettuce and spinach in the bottom of a large salad bowl. Top with peas, water chestnuts, onion, crumbled bacon and two sliced hard-boiled eggs.
- Sprinkle with salt, then pepper as desired.
- Combine mayonnaise and sour cream, stirring well. Spread mayonnaise mixture over salad to seal tightly.
- Sprinkle with cheese, then sugar.
- Garnish with remaining 2 hard-boiled egg slices.
- Chill 8 hours or overnight.

Mama'S Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can pineapple (save juice)
- 2 egg yolks, beat well
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. butter
- 2 cut up apples
- 1/2 c. nuts

Directions:
- Cook beaten egg yolks, pineapple juice, sugar and butter in double boiler until done.
- Thicken with flour.
- Pour this cooked custard over pineapple, apples and nuts and chill.

Harvest Bowl Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 eggs
- 1/4 c. sugar
- dash of salt
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2/3 c. whipping cream
- 2 c. apples, chopped
- 1 c. pineapple chunks
- 1 c. grapes, cut in half
- 2 bananas, sliced
- 1/2 c. pecans, chopped
- 1/2 c. celery, chopped

Directions:
- Beat eggs slightly.
- Add sugar, salt and lemon juice; cook until thick in double boiler, stirring constantly.
- Cool.
- Whip the cream and fold into cooled egg mixture.
- Combine fruits, pecans and celery; fold into dressing.
- Serves 10.

Tangy Tuna Cocktail

Ingredients:
- 1 large can chunk light tuna
- 2 hard-cooked eggs, chopped
- 1/4 c. chopped dill pickles
- 1/2 c. sliced radishes
- 1 tsp. Dijon mustard
- 1 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. white wine vinegar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- dash of cayenne pepper
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- shredded lettuce
- chopped parsley and lemon wedges for garnish

Directions:
- Lightly mix tuna, eggs, pickles and radishes.
- In a small bowl, blend mustard, lemon juice, vinegar, salt and cayenne. Gradually stir in salad oil with a fork until dressing is well blended.
- Mix dressing lightly with tuna mixture.
- If you wish, cover and chill for 30 minutes to 2 hours to blend flavors.

Apricot Chicken

Ingredients:
- 8 pieces fryer chicken
- 8 oz. Italian salad dressing
- 1 envelope onion soup mix
- 10 oz. jar apricot jam or apricot/pineapple preserves

Directions:
- Place chicken pieces in a 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Mix other ingredients and pour over chicken.
- Bake for 1 hour at 350°. Serves 4.

Strawberry Nut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 1 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 3 medium bananas, mashed
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 pt. sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
- Add strawberries, pineapple, bananas and nuts.
- Pour half into 2-quart mold.
- Chill until firm.
- Spread sour cream over.

Curried Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cooked diced chicken
- 1 1/2 ribs celery, chopped
- 1 can water chestnuts, chopped
- 1 1/2 c. Miracle Whip
- 1 1/2 tsp. curry powder
- 1/4 tsp. ground black pepper
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds
- 1 small onion, chopped

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate.

Sweet And Sour Chicken

Ingredients:
- 1 chicken, cut up
- 1 jar Russian salad dressing
- 1 jar apricot or peach jelly
- 1 envelope dry onion soup

Directions:
- Mix last 3 ingredients; pour over chicken.
- Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, basting occasionally.

Lesueur Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (15 oz.) can LeSueur peas
- 1 stalk chopped celery
- 1 small bell pepper, chopped
- 1 c. Cheddar cheese, diced
- 1 bunch spring onions, chopped
- few sweet Polish pickles, drained and sliced
- salt and pepper to taste
- mayonnaise to blend mixture

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill on bed of lettuce.

Shrimp Creole

Ingredients:
- 1 medium onion, minced
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 garlic clove, minced
- 1 lb. can or 2 c. tomatoes
- 1 (8 oz.) can seasoned tomato sauce
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 to 1 tsp. chili powder
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- dash of Tabasco sauce
- 1 tsp. cornstarch
- 1 lb. cleaned cooked shrimp
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper

Directions:
- Cook and stir onion, celery, green pepper and garlic in oil until tender, not brown.
- Add tomatoes, tomato sauce and seasoning.
- Simmer, uncovered, 45 minutes.
- Cook over low heat. Mix cornstarch with 2 teaspoons water.
- Stir into sauce.
- Add shrimp.
- Cover and simmer until tender, about 5 minutes.
- Serve over rice.
- Makes 6 servings.

Lime Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) box lime jello
- 1 (3 oz.) box lemon jello
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 large box cottage cheese
- 1/2 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 c. nuts, chopped

Directions:
- Dissolve
- jello in 2 cups boiling water.
- Add pineapple (with juice).
- When
- cooled,
- add cottage cheese, Eagle Brand and nuts. Stir. Congeal.

Peas And Peanut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 tsp. dill seed
- 1/2 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. dry mustard
- dash of salt
- 1 c. Spanish peanuts
- 1/2 tsp. vinegar
- 1/4 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 2 c. peas (frozen), cooked and drained

Directions:
- Cook peas.
- Drain and cool.
- Mix sour cream, mayonnaise, sugar, dill seed, mustard, vinegar and salt until creamy smooth. (I add garlic powder, too.)
- Add peas; blend.
- Add peanuts.
- Best served that same day.

Hot Italian Submarine Sandwiches

Ingredients:
- submarine sandwich rolls
- ham (3 to 4 thin slices per sandwich)
- Mozzarella cheese
- lettuce
- tomatoes
- onions
- Wish-Bone Italian salad dressing

Directions:
- Fill sandwich roll with ingredients.
- Add salt, pepper and about two tablespoons Italian salad dressing.
- Roll in aluminum foil and bake about 10 to 15 minutes at 350°.

One Dish Supper

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. rotini
- 2 qt. tomatoes
- 2 tsp. garlic, dried
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1/2 c. chopped peppers
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3/4 tsp. pepper
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 lb. ground turkey

Directions:
- Fry turkey burger in large skillet.
- Bring tomatoes to boil in turkey (cooked).
- Add dry rotini to boiling mixture.
- Cook about 7 or 8 minutes or until tender.
- Add remaining ingredients.
- Serve with green peas, tossed salad and garlic toast.

Chicken Pasta Salad

Ingredients:
- 12 oz. pkg. curly noodles
- 28 oz. can stewed chopped tomatoes
- 1/3 c. black olives, chopped
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/3 to 1/2 c. Parmesan cheese
- 1 pkg. frozen peas
- 2 c. cooked chicken
- 1 pkg. Good Seasons Italian dressing

Directions:
- In large bowl, mix all ingredients.
- Toss with the Italian dressing which has been made according to package directions.

Orange Fruit Salad(Low-Fat)  

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cottage cheese (low-fat)
- 1 large tub lite Cool Whip
- 1 large orange jello (sugar-free)
- 2 (11 oz.) cans mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 large crushed pineapple, drained

Directions:
- Mix together all ingredients, except jello. Then add jello last. Mix well and keep in refrigerator until firm.

Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 Can Pineapple tidbits, drained
- 1 Can fruit cocktail, drained
- 1 Can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 Cup chopped pecans
- 1 Cup (8 oz.) sour cream
- 1 container cool whip
- 3 Cup miniature marshmallows

Directions:
- In a large bowl, combine fruit, nuts and sour cream.
- Fold in cool whip and marshmallows.
- Refrigerate.
- Yields 10-12.

Pineapple Cottage Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lemon jello
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 2 c. boiling water or 1 c. water and 1 c. fruit juice
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. condensed canned milk
- 2 Tbsp. horseradish
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Mix other ingredients together.
- Add to cooled jello and chill.

Minted Lime Mold Salad(Yield:  6 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 1 c. water
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lime Jell-O
- 2 c. diced pears
- 1/8 tsp. peppermint extract
- 1 c. honeydew melon balls
- 1 c. cantaloupe melon balls
- mint sprigs and lettuce leaves (to garnish)
- 1 (6 oz.) can frozen limeade concentrate
- 1/2 c. cold water
- 1 1/4 c. ginger ale

Directions:
- Heat 1 cup water and limeade concentrate to boiling.
- Pour over gelatin in large bowl.
- Stir until dissolved.
- Stir in 1/2 cup cold water, ginger ale and peppermint extract.
- Chill until partially set.
- Stir in pears and melon balls.
- Pour into 7 cup jello mold.
- Chill until firm.
- Unmold onto lettuce and garnish with extra cantaloupe balls and mint sprigs.

Delicious And Healthy Pancakes

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. white flour
- 1/4 c. whole wheat flour
- 1/2 tsp. baking soda
- 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1/2 c. buttermilk
- 1/2 c. skim milk
- 1 egg white, beaten to soft peaks
- 2 tsp. olive oil or salad oil

Directions:
- Preheat frypan or griddle.
- In medium bowl, combine dry ingredients.
- Add buttermilk and skim milk; stir just until combined.
- Fold in egg white gently; add olive or salad oil.
- Cook on hot griddle which has been sprayed with nonstick spray.
- These pancakes contain no cholesterol.

Black Bean Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 can (15 oz.) black beans, rinsed and drained
- 1/2 c. salad dressing (fat free works good)
- 1/2 c. reduced calorie sour cream
- 1 can (4 oz.) chopped green chilies, drained
- 2 Tbsp. chili powder
- 1/2 tsp. garlic powder
- few drops hot pepper sauce

Directions:
- Mash beans with fork.
- Stir in remaining ingredients until well blended, refrigerate.
- Serve with tortilla chips.

Cool Whip Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large container Cool Whip
- 1 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 large can pineapple, drained
- 1 can milk
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 can Angel Flake coconut

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together and chill.

Pumpkin Nut Bread

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. baking soda
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. cloves
- 1 tsp. ginger
- 1 tsp. nutmeg
- 1 Tbsp. cinnamon
- 1 c. pumpkin
- 2 eggs
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 1/2 c. cold water
- 1 3/4 c. flour
- 3/4 c. chopped nuts
- 1 c. candied orange slices, cut up

Directions:
- Mix all together and put in muffin tins. Sprinkle pumpkin seed on top. Bake at 325° for 25 to 30 minutes.

Golden Glow Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lemon jello
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 1 c. pineapple
- 1/2 tsp. vinegar
- 1 c. grated ____
- 1 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Prepare jello using pineapple juice for cold water.
- After thickened, add other ingredients.

Strawberry Pretzel Salad #2

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pretzels (small)
- 3/4 c. margarine, melted
- 3 tsp. sugar

Directions:
- Mix together and pat into 9 x 13-inch pan.
- Bake 8 minutes in 400° oven.
- Set aside to cool.

Chicken Rice Salad

Ingredients:
