- 1/3 c. French dressing
- 2/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. salt (optional)
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1 1/2 c. cooked, diced chicken
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. drained mandarin oranges
- 1 c. chunk pineapple
- 1/2 c. chopped walnuts
- 3 c. cold fluffy rice

Directions:
- Combine French dressing, mayonnaise, salt and pepper to make dressing.

Ruth'S Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. milk
- 2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients together.
- Shake well.
- Serve over spinach salad.

Easy Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small box orange Jell-O (dry)*
- 1 small Cool Whip
- 1 small cottage cheese
- 1 small can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 small pineapple, drained
- 1 small mini marshmallows

Directions:
- * Do not add water.

Watergate Salad(Club Member: Lee Higginbotham)  

Ingredients:
- 1 large can crushed pineapple
- 1 pkg. pistachio instant pudding
- 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 large Cool Whip
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Mix all the ingredients in order listed. Cool before serving.

Stir-Fried Beef And Vegetables

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. lean round steak
- 2 Tbsp. soy sauce
- 1 Tbsp. oriental sesame seed oil
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 2 tsp. cornstarch
- 1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 medium celery stalks
- 1 large carrot
- 1 large red pepper
- 1 large yellow pepper
- water chestnuts and mushrooms
- onions

Directions:
- Trim fat; slice meat into thin strips.
- Combine salad oil, sugar, cornstarch and pepper sauce and add meat strips.
- Cut vegetables up.

Crunchy Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 bunches broccoli, broken into flowerets
- 1 head cauliflower, broken into flowerets
- 8 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1 medium sweet onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. raisins
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 3 Tbsp. vinegar and 1/3 c. sugar

Directions:
- Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar to make dressing.
- Set aside.

Marinated Shrimp

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. shrimp, cooked and peeled
- 2 medium onions, sliced
- 2 small green peppers, sliced
- 4 carrots, sliced and cooked
- 10 3/4 oz. can tomato soup
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard
- 2 cucumbers, sliced

Directions:
- Combine shrimp, carrots, onions and peppers; set aside.
- Mix well soup, vinegar, salad oil, sugar and mustard.
- Pour over shrimp and vegetables.
- Mix lightly.
- Refrigerate overnight. Before serving, add cucumber slices.
- (You can also add orange or apple slices, dew melon cubes, etc.).
- Serves 6.

Frozen Cheese Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can condensed milk
- 4 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 large can pineapple, crushed and drained
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 9 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all together and freeze.

Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. cauliflower pieces
- 1 c. chopped tomato
- 1 c. chopped green onions
- 1/2 c. chopped pimento
- chopped olives
- mayonnaise to coat
- grated cheese
- crumbled bacon

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill.

Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small container sour cream
- 2 large Philadelphia cream cheese
- 1 envelope taco seasoning mix
- lettuce, onion, tomatoes and cheese, chopped

Directions:
- Mix first 3 ingredients.
- Put in bottom of container and layer shredded lettuce, tomatoes and onions.
- Place cheese on top. Serve with nacho chips.

Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 small pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 pt. strawberries
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 3 mashed bananas
- 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 2 cups of boiling water.
- Add strawberries, pineapple and bananas.
- Stir well.
- Pour half (about 2 1/2 cups) in a greased pan.
- Let jell, about 30 minutes.
- Spread sour cream on top.
- Add the other half of strawberry mixture.
- Let jell.

Frosty Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (8 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1/4 c. sifted powdered sugar

Directions:
- Combine cranberries and pineapple.
- Mix powdered sugar and sour cream together.
- Stir into fruit.
- Pour into shallow dish and freeze until firm.
- Remove from freezer and let sit a few minutes before serving.

Sweetheart Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pineapple, undrained
- 1 pkg. Knox plain gelatine
- 1/2 c. sugar plus 1 Tbsp.
- 2 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 2 Tbsp. cherry juice
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 large container Cool Whip or 2 small containers
- 1 small jar cherries, chopped

Directions:
- Dissolve gelatine in cold water, set aside.
- Add pineapple and sugar together in pot on stove.
- Bring to a boil.
- Add the gelatine mixture to the pineapple mixture.
- Stir until gelatine is dissolved.
- Add lemon and cherry juice, let cool.
- Mash cream cheese and chopped cherries.
- Add to pineapple mixture.
- Chill to slightly thickened.
- Add Cool Whip.
- Top with chopped walnuts and cherries, if desired.
- Mix with mixer in large bowl.

Hot Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 medium potatoes
- 5 to 6 slices bacon
- 1/3 c. bacon fat
- 3/4 c. chopped onion
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 1/2 c. sugar or as sweet as desired
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- pepper
- 3/4 c. water
- 1/2 c. vinegar or equal to amount of sugar used

Directions:
- Boil potatoes in skins. Peel and slice thin. Cook bacon until crisp, then cook onion in bacon fat. Mix in flour, sugar, salt and pepper. Stir water in gradually. Add vinegar gradually. Cook and stir until it boils for 1 minute. Pour over potatoes. Add the bacon. Cover and let stand until ready to serve.

Zero Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. tomato juice
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion
- salt (optional)
- pepper to taste

Directions:
- Combine ingredients in a jar with tightly fitted top. Shake well and refrigerate. Shake well before use.

Coca-Cola Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can black pitted cherries
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. black cherry jello
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 12 oz. Coca-Cola

Directions:
- Cream the cream cheese and nuts; set aside.
- Drain juice from cherries and pineapple; bring juice to a boil.
- Pour over jello to dissolve.
- Let cool; add Coke.
- Combine all ingredients and refrigerate.

B L T Salad Toss

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cherry tomato halves
- 2 c. celery slices
- 1 c. salad dressing
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/4 c. onion rings
- 6 crisply cooked bacon slices, crumbled
- 1 qt. shredded lettuce

Directions:
- Combine tomatoes, celery, salad dressing, green pepper and onion; toss lightly.
- Chill.
- Add bacon; toss lightly.
- Spoon vegetable mixture over shredded lettuce.
- Garnish with additional cherry tomato halves and bacon curls.

Tapioca Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange jello
- 2 pkg. American tapioca pudding
- 2 1/4 c. water
- 2 envelopes Dream Whip, made according to pkg. directions
- 1 large can crushed pineapple or pineapple tidbits, drained
- 1 large can mandarin oranges, drained

Directions:
- Cook the first 3 ingredients together until thick; let cool. Mix Dream Whip; add to cooled jello-pudding mixture, along with drained pineapple and oranges.
- Refrigerate.

Korean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bag spinach
- 1 can bean sprouts, drained
- 1 can sliced water chestnuts, drained
- 3 chopped hard-boiled eggs
- 6 slices bacon
- 1 c. oil
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 medium onion, grated
- 1/3 c. catsup
- 3/4 c. sugar

Directions:
- Cook bacon; drain and crumble.
- In large salad bowl, mix spinach, sprouts, water chestnuts, eggs and bacon.
- In a jar, combine oil, sugar, catsup, vinegar, Worcestershire sauce and onion; shake well.
- Sprinkle dressing on salad and toss.
- Serve. Dressing refrigerates well and is good on any salad.

Carrot-Raisin Salad(Makes 4 Servings)  

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 c. shredded carrots
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- dash of pepper
- 1 Tbsp. orange juice
- 1/2 c. raisins

Directions:
- Mix shredded carrots with combined ingredients.
- Refrigerate before serving.

Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. diced, cooked, skinless chicken (white meat)
- 1 c. diced apple
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 3 Tbsp. lo-cal mayonnaise

Directions:
- Combine chicken and apple.
- Sprinkle with lemon juice and toss together.
- Mix celery with mayonnaise and add to chicken and apple mixture.
- Toss lightly.
- Chill.
- Serve on lettuce or eat as is. Makes 4 to 5 servings.

Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. kraut
- 1/2 c. diced onion
- 1/2 c. mango peppers, diced
- 1 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill before serving.

Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 to 1 1/2 lb. ground beef
- 1 envelope taco seasoning
- 1/2 c. water
- 1 head lettuce
- 2 bunches green onion
- 3 tomatoes, diced
- 8 oz. shredded Longhorn cheese
- 1 small bottle Catalina dressing
- 1 bag crushed Fritos

Directions:
- Brown ground beef.
- Add taco seasoning and water.
- Cook 15 minutes.
- Cool.
- In separate bowl, chop the lettuce, onion and tomatoes.
- Add ground beef.
- Refrigerate 1 hour.
- Before serving, add cheese, dressing and crushed Fritos.

Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 cucumbers, chopped
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 3 Tbsp. minced onion
- 1 c. sour cream
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice

Directions:
- Prepare salad 1 hour before using and refrigerate.

Garden Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. elbow macaroni (uncooked)
- 1 c. small cubed ham
- 1 c. carrots, sliced thin
- 1 c. chopped cucumber
- 2 Tbsp. chopped purple onion
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing

Directions:
- Cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain and rinse with cold water. Add ham and remaining ingredients. Toss well. Chill at least 4 hours before serving.

Italian Beef

Ingredients:
- 5 to 7 lb. chuck roast or rump roast
- 1 envelope dried onion soup (Lipton)
- 1 envelope Italian seasoning (for making salad dressing)
- 2 qt. water (if needed)
- 2 bouillon beef cubes
- 2 Tbsp. chili sauce
- 6 oz. tomato paste
- 1 can beef broth
- 1 tsp. oregano

Directions:
- Cook the roast with the dried onion soup and Italian seasoning for 12 hours in crock-pot on low.
- Cool and slice or shred meat. Save drippings.
- To drippings, add the remaining ingredients. Simmer until ready to serve.

Sauerkraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 32 oz. sauerkraut, drained
- 1 c. diced celery
- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 (8 oz.) can water chestnuts, drained and sliced
- 1 c. green pepper, diced
- 2 Tbsp. pimento
- 1/4 c. grated carrot

Directions:
- Mix together and set aside while preparing dressing.

Holiday Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 envelope unflavored jello
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 (16 oz.) can cranberry sauce

Directions:
- Mix jello and cold water; set for a couple minutes and add 1/4 cup boiling water until dissolved.
- Add all ingredients.
- Chill!

Quick Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. small red potatoes, cooked
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions
- 1 c. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing
- paprika or black pepper
- chives
- bacon bits

Directions:
- Cut slightly cooked potatoes into 1 inch cubes.
- In large bowl combine potatoes, onions and salad dressing.
- Toss gently. Dust with paprika.
- Garnish with chives and bacon bits.
- Serve warm or at room temperature.

Linley'S Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small pkg. jello (any flavor)
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 large cream cheese (room temperature)
- 1 small can crushed pineapple
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 c. 7-Up

Directions:
- Mix jello and water.
- Let cool and add cream cheese.
- Mash with a fork and stir together.
- Then add pineapple and Cool Whip. Last, add 7-Up slowly.
- Put into square Pyrex or plastic container.
- Refrigerate.

Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. oil
- 1/2 c. vinegar
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 tsp. garlic salt
- 1 tsp. onion salt

Directions:
- Put all ingredients in a mixing bowl and mix for 5 minutes. Pour into a pint jar.
- Serve on garden salad.

Thousand Island Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. catsup
- 1/4 tsp. sugar
- 2 1/2 Tbsp. sweet pickle relish

Directions:
- Put mayonnaise, catsup and sugar into blender; blend 10 to 15 seconds.
- Add relish and blend for 2 to 3 seconds.
- Pour into jar or container and keep refrigerated.

Mayonnaise Cake

Ingredients:
- 2 c. flour
- 1 c. water
- 5 Tbsp. cocoa
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. salad dressing
- 2 tsp. soda

Directions:
- Blend together in sifter:
- flour, cocoa, sugar and soda. Blend in salad dressing and gradually add water to mixture.
- When mixed thoroughly, add vanilla.
- Cook 30 to 40 minutes at 350°.

Chicken And Grape Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cubed, cooked chicken
- lemon juice
- salt and pepper
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 2 oz. pkg. sliced almonds
- 1 c. red seedless grapes, halved
- 1 c. chopped celery

Directions:
- Sprinkle chicken with lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste. Add remaining ingredients. Add more mayonnaise if necessary until chicken barely holds together. Chill before serving.

Fresh Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch fresh spinach
- 5 slices bacon
- 2/3 c. oil
- 1/4 c. garlic wine vinegar
- 2 Tbsp. white wine
- 2 Tbsp. soy sauce
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 tsp. curry powder
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. seasoned pepper
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped

Directions:
- Wash well and thoroughly dry spinach.
- Tear leaves into bite-sized pieces and refrigerate.
- In a heavy skillet, fry the bacon until crisp.
- Drain on paper towel and crumble.
- Shake the oil, vinegar, wine, soy sauce, sugar, mustard, curry powder, salt and seasoned pepper together and pour over spinach.
- Add bacon and toss lightly.
- Top with chopped boiled eggs.

Jackie'S Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 1/2 c. raisins
- 1/3 c. sunflower seeds, unsalted, if possible
- 5 green onions, sliced
- 1 c. light mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/3 c. Hormel real bacon bits

Directions:
- Wash and cut broccoli flowerets into bite-sized pieces.
- Add raisins, sunflower seeds and onions.
- Mix mayonnaise, sugar and vinegar.
- Pour over broccoli mixture.
- Mix lightly.
- Top with bacon bits.
- Serves 4 to 6.

Four-Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. chunk pineapple
- 1 c. or can mandarin oranges
- 1 c. Angel Flake coconut
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Drain fruit.
- Add coconut and chill. Stir in sour cream just before serving.

Christmas Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 1 small can pineapple, crushed
- 1 (12 oz.) pkg. cottage cheese
- juice of 1/2 lemon or 1/2 orange
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 envelope plain gelatin
- 1/2 c. nuts, chopped (if desired)
- 1 pkg. cherry jello

Directions:
- Prepare lime jello according to package directions but reduce water by 1/2 cup and stir in pineapple.
- Pour into large dish or pan.
- Place in refrigerator until firm.
- Combine cottage cheese, lemon juice and sugar and mash with a fork or with mixer until smooth.
- Dissolve gelatin in 1/4 cup cold water.
- Blend into cottage cheese.
- Add nuts.
- Spread over lime jello.
- Prepare cherry jello according to package directions.
- Pour over filling. Chill until firm.

Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 stalk celery, chopped
- 1/2 small onion
- 1/3 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 3/4 tsp. salt
- pepper as desired
- 3 c. cooled, drained, cooked macaroni (about 1 1/2 c. uncooked)
- 1 hard-boiled egg, chopped

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients, except macaroni and egg, in large bowl. Add macaroni and egg.
- Mix lightly.
- Chill before serving.

Herbed Carrot Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 c. sour cream
- 3 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 tsp. snipped chives
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. dried dill weed
- 1/2 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 4 medium carrots (2 c.), thinly bias sliced
- 8 medium potatoes, cooked, peeled and sliced (7 c.)
- 1 c. thinly bias sliced celery
- 1/2 c. pitted ripe olives, sliced
- leaf lettuce (optional)

Directions:
- Combine mayonnaise or salad dressing, sour cream, lemon juice, chives, Worcestershire, salt, dill weed, mustard and pepper until well combined.
- In a medium pan, heat small amount of water to boiling; add carrots and simmer, uncovered, for 2 minutes.
- Drain. Rinse with cold water; drain again.
- In a large bowl, gently toss together the sliced potatoes, sliced carrots, celery and olives. Add sour cream mixture.
- Gently toss to coat well.
- Cover and chill several hours.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. cream cheese, softened
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1 can whole cranberry sauce
- 1 (9 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 c. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine first 6 ingredients in a large bowl.
- Fold in Cool Whip.
- Pour into a loaf pan or dish and freeze.

Greta'S Taco Dip

Ingredients:
- 8 oz. sour cream
- 2 or 3 cans bean dip
- 1 or 2 bunches green onions
- 8 oz. Cheddar cheese, shredded
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning mix
- 1/2 c. salad dressing
- 3 or 4 tomatoes, chopped

Directions:
- Mix taco seasoning mix, sour cream and salad dressing together and set aside.

Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple (save juice)
- 4 red apples, diced
- 1 c. pecans
- 4 slices cheese, diced
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 1 egg

Directions:
- Drain pineapple; set juice aside.
- Mix pineapple, apples, pecans and cheese.
- Cook pineapple juice, sugar, flour and egg on medium heat, stirring constantly.
- Pour over salad.

Pink Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 small box strawberry jello
- 1 small carton cottage cheese
- 1 (9 oz.) carton Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all the ingredients together and chill.

Chinese Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken breasts, cooked, diced and chilled
- 3 to 4 green onions, chopped
- 1 head lettuce, chopped
- 1 bottle sesame seeds, roasted
- 1 pkg. slivered almonds
- 1 (5 oz.) can chow mein noodles

Directions:
- Mix chicken, onions and lettuce. Add sesame seeds, almonds and noodles.

6-Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- 1 c. mandarin oranges
- 1 c. small marshmallows
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 c. pecans

Directions:
- Pour pineapple over marshmallows and let stand until mushy. Mix all together and let set.
- Refrigerate in covered dish overnight.
- Very good with ham.
- You can also add maraschino cherries.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 heads broccoli
- 1 lb. bacon
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 c. mayo
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar
- 2 c. Cheddar cheese

Directions:
- Cook bacon until crispy, then crumble into small pieces.
- Cut broccoli into small pieces; mix all ingredients together.
- Chill and serve.

Mandarin Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 60 Ritz crackers, crushed
- 1 stick melted butter
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 small can orange juice, thawed (undiluted)
- 2 cans mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 middle size Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and pour over crust.
- Cover and let set in refrigerator.

Wine Cake

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 lb. 3 oz.) pkg. yellow cake mix
- 4 eggs
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1 tsp. nutmeg
- 1 (3 5/8 oz.) pkg. instant vanilla pudding
- 3/4 c. sherry
- confectioners sugar

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 350°.
- Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.
- Beat with mixer 5 to 7 minutes.
- Bake 45 to 50 minutes. Sprinkle with confectioners sugar while still warm.

Seven-Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 c. green pepper
- 1 c. celery
- 1 red onion
- 1 pkg. frozen peas
- 1 pt. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 pkg. Mozzarella cheese
- bacon bits

Directions:
- Layer in dish as given, starting with the lettuce.
- Chill in refrigerator 6 to 8 hours.
- Do not stir.

Golden Glow Salad

Ingredients:
- 12 large marshmallows
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained
- 6 medium grated carrots
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. cream cheese

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water and cool.
- Melt marshmallows in pineapple juice over low heat.
- Fold until smooth.
- Blend cheese, carrots and pineapple.
- When gelatin cools, blend together all ingredients.
- Pour into mold and chill several hours.

Layered Summer Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. shredded lettuce or fresh greens of choice
- 1/2 c. low-calorie buttermilk dressing
- 2 strips bacon, broiled and crumbled
- 2 c. cherry tomatoes, halved
- 2 oz. cubed farmer cheese or other low-fat cheese
- 8 oz. turkey or chicken, cooked and cubed

Directions:
- In a salad bowl, layer the ingredients as follows: lettuce, 1/4 cup dressing, bacon, tomatoes, cheese, turkey or chicken and remaining 1/4 cup of dressing.
- Serve immediately or refrigerate overnight.

Meat Marinade(Chicken, Pork, Beef)  

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. soy sauce
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. honey
- 1 Tbsp. wine vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. garlic powder or crushed cloves
- 1/2 tsp. ginger

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients.
- Marinate meat about 4 to 6 hours. Refrigerate for about 1 hour before grilling.

Fruit Jello Salad(Makes One Dish)  

Ingredients:
- 1 large box lime jello
- 1 (15 oz.) can crushed pineapple (in own syrup)
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2/3 c. nuts

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in 1 1/2 cups of hot water.
- Reserve 1/3 cup to mix with mayonnaise.
- Add canned pineapple and juice.
- Stir in cottage cheese.
- Mix the mayonnaise with 1/3 cup hot jello and add to the rest of mixture.
- Add nuts last.
- Set in refrigerator.

Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 c. potatoes, diced or cubed and cooked
- 2 hard-boiled eggs
- 1/2 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. diced onions
- 1/4 c. sweet relish
- salt and pepper to taste
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 tsp. mustard

Directions:
- Cover potatoes with water; bring to boil.
- Lower flame and simmer until tender.
- Drain, peel and cut potatoes into bite size pieces.
- Mix onions, celery, eggs and sweet relish with mayonnaise and mustard.
- Stir in the potatoes.
- Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover bowl and refrigerate for 2 hours.
- Serves 4 persons.

Cauliflower Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 to 1 head chopped lettuce
- 1 head cauliflower, florets
- 1 bunch green onions, chopped
- 1 lb. crisp fried bacon, crumbled
- 12 oz. grated cheese (Colby or Cheddar)
- 2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- Mix mayonnaise and sugar; layer in large bowl first 4 ingredients.
- Mix in mayonnaise mixture, top with cheese.
- Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. cooked, salted rice
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 1/2 c. green onions
- 1/2 c. sweet pepper
- 1/2 c. green olives
- 1/2 c. ripe olives
- 2 hard-boiled eggs, diced
- 1 small jar pimentos
- French dressing

Directions:
- Mix
- together; add enough French dressing to cover all. Serve on lettuce leaves if desired.

French Dressing

Ingredients:
- 2 c. salad oil
- 1 c. catsup
- juice of 2 lemons
- 1 Tbsp. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. celery salt
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 6 Tbsp. sugar
- 6 Tbsp. water

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except sugar and water in a quart jar. Boil sugar and water 5 minutes.
- Add to other ingredients and shake well.
- Store in refrigerator.
- Makes 1 quart.

Shrimp Dip

Ingredients:
- 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 2 pkg. dry green onion dip mix
- salad dressing
- shrimp (as much as you wish), chopped in large pieces
- jalapeno pepper to taste

Directions:
- Have cheese at room temperature.
- Add onion mix and salad dressing to make smooth.
- Add pepper and beat with electric mixer. Stir in shrimp.
- Chill.

Haystacks

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) pkg. butterscotch morsels
- 3 tsp. salad oil
- 1 (3 oz.) can chow mix Chinese noodles (2 c.)
- 1 small can salted peanuts

Directions:
- In top of double boiler over hot water, melt butterscotch morsels.
- Stir in salad oil.
- In large bowl, mix noodles, peanuts and butterscotch morsels.
- Mix thoroughly with a fork.
- Drop mixture onto wax paper by teaspoonful.

Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)
- 1/2 c. evaporated skim milk
- 1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1 tsp. minced garlic
- 2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)
- 2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained
- 1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.
- Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.
- Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.
- Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.
- Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.
- Add Parmesan cheese and mix well.

Creamy Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can sliced peaches
- 1 (16 oz.) can apricots, halved
- 1 (16 oz.) can sliced pears
- 1 (16 oz.) can pineapple chunks
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges
- 2 c. fresh strawberries
- 1 small jar maraschino cherries
- 5 small bananas, sliced
- 1 box vanilla instant pudding mix

Directions:
- Drain all canned fruits, reserving 2 cups mixed juices.
- Layer drained fruit, strawberries, cherries and bananas in bowl. Combine pudding mix with reserved juices in bowl, beating until thick.
- Pour over fruit.
- Do not toss.
- Chill for 2 hours before serving.
- Yields 15 servings.

Broccoli Puff

Ingredients:
- 1 (10 oz.) frozen, cut broccoli
- 1 can cream of mushroom soup
- 2 oz. sharp American cheese, shredded
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1/4 c. mayo or salad dressing
- 1 beaten egg
- 1/4 c. bread crumbs with 1 Tbsp. butter (topping)

Directions:
- Place broccoli in baking dish.
- Mix rest of ingredients and pour over broccoli.
- Then place topping mixture on top of broccoli and bake at 350° for 45 minutes.

Sweet And Light Bread

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 c. flour
- 1 c. sugar
- 3 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 1/4 c. milk
- 1 egg

Directions:
- Heat oven to 350°.
- Grease and flour loaf pan (9 x 5 x 3-inch).
- Measure all of the ingredients into large mixing bowl. Beat on medium speed for 30 seconds.
- Pour into prepared pan. Bake 55 to 65 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean when inserted.
- Allow to cool.

Hawaiian Baked Beans

Ingredients:
- 1 (16 oz.) can pork and beans
- 1 (15 oz.) can three bean salad
- 1 (8 oz.) can juice-packed crushed pineapple
- 1/3 c. barbecue sauce
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients in a casserole dish.
- Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 1 hour.
- Makes 6 servings.

German Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 Tbsp. butter or 2 Tbsp. bacon fryings and 1 Tbsp. lard
- 1/3 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/2 c. finely sliced onion
- 1 to 2 c. finely chopped cabbage
- 6 to 8 boiled potatoes, chopped

Directions:
- Peel and boil the chopped potatoes.
- Heat in skillet the first 4 ingredients until very hot.
- In bowl, put the chopped cabbage and the chopped potatoes.
- Pour the ingredients over it; mix well. Return to stove until all is hot.
- Serve at once.

The Best Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 12 medium potatoes
- 12 large eggs, hard-boiled
- 1 large onion, chopped
- 1 green pepper, chopped
- 1 qt. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- dash of salt, pepper and cayenne

Directions:
- Boil potatoes with their skins until tender (red potatoes are best).
- Hard-boil 12 large eggs.

Pot Roast With Vegetables

Ingredients:
- 4 to 5 lb. rump roast
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 Tbsp. butter
- 1 small onion, sliced
- 1 clove garlic, crushed
- 1 tsp. dried thyme leaves
- 1 tsp. dried marjoram leaves
- 1 bay leaf, crumbled
- 8 whole black peppers
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed beef broth, undiluted
- 12 small white onions
- 8 carrots (1 lb.), pared and halved
- 1 sprig parsley
- 3 Tbsp. flour

Directions:
- Wipe roast with paper towels.
- Place oil and butter in 5-quart Dutch oven or heavy kettle.
- Over medium heat, brown roast with sliced onion, turning roast with 2 wooden spoons until brown on all sides.
- Add seasonings to drippings and saute, stirring, 1/2 minute.
- Add beef broth; bring to a boil.
- Reduce to simmer and cook just below the boiling point, covered, 2 1/2 hours.
- Turn meat occasionally.
- Add vegetables and simmer, covered, for 30 minutes or until vegetables are tender.

Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 box instant pistachio pudding
- 1/2 c. marshmallows (mini or chopped)
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple, not drained
- 1/2 c. chopped nuts
- 1 (9 oz.) Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and refrigerate.

Joe C.'S Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. cottage cheese
- 1 medium (10 oz.) container Cool Whip
- 1 large pkg. orange jello
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained

Directions:
- Mix cottage cheese and Cool Whip with dry jello.
- Add drained fruit.
- Quick, easy and a refreshing taste for any lunch or dinner.

Cherry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 c. cherry pie filling
- 1 c. Eagle Brand milk
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 c. mini marshmallows
- 1 c. chopped nuts
- 1 large Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill.

Spinach Salad(If You Like Spinach, You Will Love This Spinach Salad!)  

Ingredients:
- 10 oz. fresh spinach
- 8 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
- 1/2 c. or more croutons
- 1 can bean sprouts
- 2 to 3 hard-boiled eggs, chopped

Directions:
- Wash spinach and break into small pieces in a large bowl.
- Add bacon, eggs and bean sprouts and lightly toss.
- Top with croutons and this dressing:

Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. pistachio pudding
- 1 c. chopped pecans
- 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 can crushed pineapple
- 1 (9 oz.) carton Cool Whip

Directions:
- Mix; chill and serve.

Oil And Vinegar Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 2/3 c. salad oil
- 2/3 c. cider vinegar
- 1 tsp. each: salt, pepper and dried Italian herbs

Directions:
- Put all ingredients in a pint jar; shake to mix well.

Soft Pretzels

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. active dry yeast
- 1 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 c. warm water
- 2 1/2 to 3 c. all-purpose flour
- 1 tsp. salt
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 egg white, beaten with 1 tsp. each: salt and water
- coarse salt

Directions:
- Dissolve yeast and sugar in water; let stand about 10 minutes. Add 2 cups of the flour, salt and oil; beat until smooth. Gradually stir in more flour (about 1/2 cup) to make a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface.
- Knead until smooth and elastic, adding more flour (up to 1/2 cup) if necessary to prevent dough from being too sticky.
- Place dough in a greased bowl. Cover; let raise in warm place until doubled, 45 minutes to 1 hour. Punch dough down; divide into 12 balls.
- Roll each out to form 18-inch rope.
- Twist into pretzel shape.
- Let rise, uncovered, 20 to 25 minutes.
- Brush lightly with egg white mixture and sprinkle with salt.
- Bake at 425° until well browned, 12 to 15 minutes.

Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. coarsely chopped pretzels
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. melted butter
- 8 oz. Cool Whip
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry Jell-O
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. sliced frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Mix pretzel, sugar and butter.
- Pat on bottom of a 13 x 9-inch pan.
- Bake at 400° for 8 minutes.
- Mix cream cheese and sugar. Fold in Cool Whip.
- Spread on cooled crust.
- Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
- Add frozen berries. Mix until somewhat thick. Spread over cream cheese mix.
- Refrigerate.

Mandarin Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 60 Ritz crackers
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 1 stick melted margarine
- 2 cans oranges, drained and mashed
- 1 (16 oz.) can frozen orange juice
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 8 oz. Cool Whip

Directions:
- Crumble crackers and add sugar and melted margarine.
- Use half for crust and half for top.
- Mix orange juice, mashed oranges and Cool Whip.
- Pour over crust and top with other 1/2 of cracker crumbs.

Korean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. fresh spinach
- 1 can bean sprouts
- 1 can water chestnuts
- 4 hard-boiled eggs
- 1/2 lb. bacon
- 1 c. Wesson oil
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1/3 c. warm ketchup
- 1 tsp. onion juice
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce

Directions:
- Break and take the spinach stems out.
- Rinse and drain bean sprouts.
- Slice water chestnuts.
- Chop eggs.
- Cook and break up bacon.
- Mix the spinach, bean sprouts, water chestnuts, eggs and bacon together.

Strawberry Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. margarine
- 3 Tbsp. brown sugar
- 2 1/2 c. crushed pretzels
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. strawberry gelatin
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 lb. pkg. frozen strawberries, slightly thawed
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 scant c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip

Directions:
- Combine margarine, brown sugar and pretzels.
- Mix well and bake in lightly buttered 9 x 13-inch pan at 350° for 10 minutes. Dissolve gelatin in water.
- While hot, add to strawberries.
- Cool until mixture begins to set.
- Meanwhile, cream sugar and cream cheese and fold into Cool Whip.
- Spread cream cheese mixture over cooled crust.
- When gelatin begins to set, pour over top of cheese mixture.
- Refrigerate until firm.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch fresh broccoli
- 1/2 c. chopped red onion
- 1 c. grated cheese
- 12 slices cooked bacon

Directions:
- Mix chopped broccoli, red onion, cheese and crumbled bacon in bowl.

Mississippi Corn Salad

Ingredients:
- 4 green onions
- 2 (16 oz.) cans Shoe Peg white corn, drained
- 1 lg. tomato, seeded and chopped
- 1/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/4 c. plain yogurt
- 1/4 tsp. dried basil, crushed
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Slice green onions and their tops.
- Stir together all ingredients in a large bowl.
- Cover and refrigerate 4 to 24 hours.

Peruvian Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 Russet potatoes
- 16 oz. cream cheese
- 2 c. half and half cream
- 2 cans (4 oz. each) green chilies
- 1/4 c. lemon juice
- 2 hard-cooked eggs
- 1 red onion
- 1 1/2 tsp. ground turmeric
- 1 tsp. ground comino
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 3 oz. can ripe pitted black olives

Directions:
- Simmer scrubbed potatoes in large pan with 1-inch of boiling, salted water for 25 to 30 minutes, until tender.
- Drain, cool and remove skins.
- In large saucepan over low heat, stir cream cheese and half and half until smooth.
- Add chopped chili peppers, lemon juice, turmeric, comino and salt.
- Simmer 1 minute, stirring occasionally.

Jello Salad For Angels

Ingredients:
- 1 angel food cake
- 1 qt. vanilla ice cream
- 2 pkg. frozen strawberries
- 2 boxes small strawberry Jell-O
- 2 1/4 c. water

Directions:
- Tear cake and fill 13 x 9-inch pan with pieces.
- Mix all other ingredients and pour over cake pieces.
- Refrigerate until set, approximately 1 hour.

Refrigerator Cukes

Ingredients:
- 20 cukes, sliced thin
- 1/2 c. salt
- 2 ice cube trays ice
- 1 Tbsp. celery seed
- 2 Tbsp. salad oil
- 2 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. mustard seed
- 2 c. vinegar
- 3 onions, sliced thin

Directions:
- Soak cukes in salt and ice for 2 hours.
- Drain well.
- Heat the remaining ingredients (except onions) for 5 minutes, then cool. Add onions and mix together.
- Put into refrigerator in quart or gallon jars or Tupperware.

Broccoli Salad(Serves 16)  

Ingredients:
- 6 c. chopped raw broccoli, flower and tender stems
- 2 onions, chopped
- 1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1 1/2 c. sunflower roasted seeds

Directions:
- Toss first four ingredients when ready to serve.
- Add dressing last.
- Serve on bed of lettuce.
- Serves 16.

Salad Dressing Cake(Heritage Recipe)  

Ingredients:
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. flour
- 4 Tbsp. cocoa
- 2 tsp. soda
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 c. lukewarm water
- 1 tsp. vanilla

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 375 degrees.
- Sift all dry ingredients together.
- Then add others, I use Crisco Oil in pan sparingly. (No flour.)
- Bake.

Salad Dressing

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 tsp. prepared mustard
- 1/4 c. vinegar (more tart, if desired)
- 1 tsp. horseradish
- 1/2 tsp. each: salt, pepper and paprika
- 1/2 c. oil

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients except oil and blend well.
- Add oil last.

Orange Peach Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. orange jello
- 1 c. hot water
- 3/4 c. peach juice
- 2 1/2 c. peach slices
- 2 Tbsp. flour
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 3/4 c. peach juice

Directions:
- Cook until thick.
- Be sure and let cool and mix with one package of Dream Whip, prepared as directed.
- Fold into cool mixture and spread on jello.

Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. cubed, cooked chicken or turkey breast
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. chopped green pepper
- 2/3 c. sliced green onions
- 1/3 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
- 1 (4 oz.) jar diced pimiento, drained
- 1/3 c. reduced-calorie mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1/4 tsp. hot sauce
- vegetable cooking spray
- 3 Tbsp. fine, dry bread crumbs
- 1 Tbsp. reduced-calorie margarine, melted

Directions:
- Combine first 6 ingredients in a large bowl; toss.
- Combine mayonnaise, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and hot sauce; add to chicken mixture, mixing well.
- Spoon mixture into a 1 1/2-quart casserole coated with cooking spray.

Broccoli Casserole

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. chopped, frozen broccoli, cooked and drained well
- 1 can mushroom soup
- 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese
- 1 c. mayonnaise (do not use salad dressing)
- 1 egg, well beaten
- 1 Tbsp. onion, chopped fine
- 1/2 c. cracker crumbs (I always use Ritz crackers)

Directions:
- Mix broccoli, mushroom soup, cheese, mayonnaise, egg and onion together in baking dish.
- Crumble cracker crumbs on top and bake in 350° oven for 30 minutes or until bubbly.

Fruit Yogurt Salad

Ingredients:
- 20 oz. can chunk pineapple, drained (reserve liquid)
- 11 oz. can mandarin oranges, drained (reserve liquid)
- 2 Tbsp. cornstarch
- 8 oz. plain yogurt
- 1 to 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. vanilla
- 1 c. grapes
- 1 sliced banana
- 1 apple, cored and sliced

Directions:
- Cook liquids and cornstarch until thick, cool.
- Combine yogurt, sugar and vanilla and mix with cooled mixture.
- Stir in fruit and chill.
- Be creative and add different kinds of fruits.

Day Before Salad(Serves 10)  

Ingredients:
- 1 large head lettuce
- 1 medium chopped onion
- 1 medium chopped bell pepper
- 6 stalks chopped celery
- crumbled bacon
- 1 pkg. frozen English peas, cooked, drained and chilled
- mayonnaise
- sugar
- Parmesan cheese, grated

Directions:
- Layer lettuce and chopped vegetables, saving enough lettuce for top layer.
- Layer the peas and last layer of lettuce.
- Cover with mayonnaise.
- Add thick layer of Parmesan cheese and refrigerate a day or two. Crumble 1/2 pound of cooked crisp bacon and spread on top.
- Looks pretty in deep glass bowl.

Blue Devil Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (6 oz.) pkg. raspberry gelatin
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (21 oz.) blueberry pie filling
- 1 (8 1/4 oz.) crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 (8 oz.) cream cheese
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. nuts, chopped
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- In a 2-quart dish, dissolve gelatin in water.
- Add pie filling and pineapple.
- Chill until firm.
- Combine cream cheese, sour cream, nuts and sugar.
- Spread over gelatin mixture.
- Chill.

Play Dough

Ingredients:
- 2 c. white flour
- 3/4 c. salt
- 1/2 c. water
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients with little hands.
- Store in Ziploc bag. Add food coloring for more fun.

Yummy Deviled Eggs

Ingredients:
- 1 doz. eggs
- 1/2 small jar sweet relish
- 1 Tbsp. mustard
- 3 Tbsp. salad dressing
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. sugar

Directions:
- Boil eggs for 15 minutes.
- Cool off and peel.
- Slice in half. Place yolks in a bowl.
- Mash with a fork until smooth.
- Add salad dressing, sweet relish, mustard and sugar.
- Salt and pepper to taste.
- Spoon up and place in center of each egg half.
- Sprinkle with paprika and refrigerate.

Frosted Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 X 13 1/2 oz. can Crushed pineapple
- 1 x 3oz. pkg. Lemon gelatin
- 7 oz. Ginger ale
- 1 lb. can Jellied cranberry sauce
- 1 tub Cool Whip
- 1 x 8 oz. pkg. Cream cheese, softened
- 1/2 c. Chopped pecans

Directions:
- Drain the pineapple and reserve syrup, make up to 1 c.
- with water. Bring to a boil, dissolve the gelatin in the hot liquid and allow to cool. Gently stir in ginger ale, chill until partially set. Whip the cranberry sauce, stir in pineapple and fold in the gelatin. Turn into a mold and chill until firm. Blend together the Cool Whip and cream cheese, spread over the gelatin mold, sprinkle with pecans.

Waldorf Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 whole chicken
- 4 ribs celery
- 1 small pkg. slivered almonds
- 2 small Granny Smith apples
- 2 small red apples
- 3 oranges
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 2 qt. cold water
- 1/4 lemon juice

Directions:
- Boil chicken and break or tear into bite size pieces; discard the skin.
- Dice celery ribs into small pieces.
- Peel and cut oranges into bite size pieces.
- Take 2 quarts of water and add the lemon juice.
- Cut up apples into bite size pieces and let soak in water-lemon mixture.
- (This prevents apples from turning brown.) Add drained apples, chicken, oranges, almonds, mayonnaise and sugar together in a bowl and mix together.
- You may add more mayonnaise and sugar to your own taste.

Pretzel Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. crushed pretzels
- 1/4 c. margarine, melted
- 4 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 large Cool Whip
- 1 large pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries

Directions:
- Combine crushed pretzels, melted margarine and sugar; mix well.
- Pour into a 9 x 12-inch dish.
- Bake at 400° for 4 to 6 minutes.
- Cool.
- Cream together the cream cheese and sugar.
- Fold in Cool Whip and spread mixture over cooled pretzels.
- Prepare strawberry jello and 2 cups boiling water.
- Add frozen strawberries to jello.
- Pour onto cheese mixture when slightly thickened.
- Refrigerate.

Diet Orange Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 small pkg. sugar-free orange jello
- 2 c. hot water
- 3 Tbsp. salad dressing
- 1 c. cottage cheese
- 1 can mandarin oranges
- 1/2 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 8 maraschino cherries, cut in half

Directions:
- Dissolve jello and hot water.
- Add salad dressing; beat.
- Stir in cottage cheese, oranges, pineapple and cherries.
- Refrigerate until set.

Fruit Cocktail Salad

Ingredients:
- fruit cocktail (don't drain)
- vanilla pudding mix
- 2 bananas
- 1 apple
- 1 jar cherries

Directions:
- Mix vanilla pudding mix in fruit cocktail, then add apple, cherries and bananas.

Bacon Cheese Fries

Ingredients:
- 1 (32 oz.) pkg. frozen French fries
- 1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced green onions
- 1/4 c. cooked crumbled bacon
- Ranch salad dressing

Directions:
- Cook French fries according to package directions. Place fries on a broiler proof dish or platter. Sprinkle with cheese, onions and bacon. Broil for 1 to 2 minutes or until cheese is melted. Serve with Ranch dressing. Yields 8 to 10 servings.

Mexican Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. hamburger, cooked and drained
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. raw rice, cooked
- 1 c. tomato sauce
- 1/2 pkg. chili seasoning

Directions:
- In large shallow baking pan, put 1 layer corn chips (not too thick, as it dries out), 1 layer rice and 1 layer hamburger mixture (hamburger, onion, tomato sauce and chili seasoning).
- Sprinkle with grated cheese (Cheddar).
- Put in oven to melt cheese.
- On top, put 1 layer shredded lettuce and 1 layer cherry tomatoes (or cut up whole tomatoes).

Chicken 'N Rice

Ingredients:
- 4 chicken breast halves
- 1/3 bottle Italian salad dressing
- 2/3 c. uncooked regular rice
- 1 (16 oz.) bag frozen broccoli, carrots, water chestnuts and red pepper combination
- 1 (2.8 oz.) can Durkee French fried onions
- 2 cans chicken broth
- 1/2 tsp. Durkee Italian seasoning

Directions:
- Place chicken breasts in an 8 x 12-inch baking dish.
- Pour salad dressing over chicken.
- Bake, uncovered, at 400° for 20 minutes.
- Place rice, vegetables and 1/2 can Durkee French fried onions around and under chicken.
- Combine chicken broth and Italian seasoning and pour the mixture over chicken and vegetables.
- Bake, uncovered, 25 minutes.
- Top with remaining onions and bake another 2 to 3 minutes.

Dump Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 large can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 12 oz. Cool Whip
- chopped nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients and chill for 1 hour.

Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1 large pkg. orange jello powder
- 1 med container cottage cheese
- 1 can mandarin orange slices
- 1 can chunk pineapple (cut up)
- 1/2 pkg. coconut (optional)

Directions:
- Mix Cool Whip and jello powder; stir in all remaining ingredients.
- Chill well.
- Garnish with extra Cool Whip (optional).

Stacy'S Marinated Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 lb. cooked potatoes, quartered (use "red" potatoes)
- 1/2 c. Italian salad dressing (the bottled type)
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions
- 1/4 c. chopped parsley
- 1 c. mayonnaise *
- sliced hard-boiled eggs

Directions:
- Leave skin on potatoes when boiling.
- Put in large bowl when boiled and after drained.
- Make the following to pour over while potatoes are still warm:
- Italian salad dressing, sliced green onions and chopped parsley.
- Pour over the warm bite-size potatoes and let set for about 1 hour to marinate.
- Toss several times. Then add the mayonnaise.
- Toss until completely covered.
- Put in fridge for at least 2 hours.
- Better to chill overnight so flavors have plenty of time to blend.
- Just before serving, garnish with sliced hard-boiled eggs.
- Great!

Curried Tuna Salad(Serves 10 To 12)  

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. uncooked shell macaroni
- 1/2 c. each: finely chopped green pepper, salted sunflower seeds, green onions (include the tips)
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen peas, thawed and drained
- 3 cans white chunk tuna
- 3 hard-boiled eggs

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; rinse and drain.

Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 pkg. strawberry jello
- 2 c. boiling water
- 2 pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 bananas, grated or mashed

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- To this hot mixture, add fruit.
- Place half of mixture in oblong dish.
- Place in refrigerator and let set.
- Then spread evenly and thinly 1/2 pint sour cream.
- Spread remaining half of jello mixture and let set.

Italian Mushroom Gravy

Ingredients:
- 1 c. fresh mushrooms
- 1 1/2 c. warm water
- 3 Tbsp. olive or salad oil
- 1 1/2 c. chopped parsley
- 2 to 3 stalks celery
- 1/2 c. diced carrot
- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. sliced zucchini
- 2 cloves minced garlic
- 1/2 tsp. rosemary
- 1/2 tsp. thyme
- 1/2 tsp. sage
- 2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce
- 2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes
- 1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
- salt to taste

Directions:
- Heat oil in frypan over medium heat.
- When hot, add parsley, garlic, rosemary, thyme, sage and vegetables.
- Cook until vegies are soft.
- Stir in tomato sauce, tomatoes and their liquid (break up tomatoes), plus the red pepper.
- Chop mushrooms and add to pan along with water.
- Can use dried Italian mushrooms with this water as a soaking liquid.
- Cover and simmer until thick, about 3 hours. Add salt to taste.
- Makes about 2 1/2 quarts.

Date Nut Bread

Ingredients:
- 2 1/2 c. plain flour
- 1 c. sugar
- 3 1/2 tsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 3 Tbsp. salad oil
- 1 1/4 c. milk
- 1 egg
- 1 c. finely chopped nuts
- 1 c. cut-up dates

Directions:
- Heat oven to 350°.
- Grease and flour loaf pan(s).
- Measure all ingredients into a large mixer bowl; beat on medium speed 1/2 minute.
- Pour into pan(s).
- Bake 55 to 65 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean.
- Remove from pan(s).
- Cool thoroughly before slicing.

Chef'S Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1/4 lb. chicken meat
- 1/4 lb. cooked ham
- 1/4 lb. Swiss cheese
- 2 hard-boiled eggs
- 1 Tbsp. chopped onions

Directions:
- Shred lettuce and put into a large bowl.
- Cut into strips the chicken, ham and cheese; arrange over lettuce.
- Top with thinly sliced eggs and scatter over with onions.

Guacamole

Ingredients:
- 3 avocados
- 2 tsp. lemon juice
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. onion, grated
- 1 tomato, chopped
- 1 hot pepper, mashed

Directions:
- Peel and mash ripe avocado pulp.
- Add remaining ingredients. Serve as a salad, heaped on tomato slices, or as a dip for chips.

Orange Sherbet Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. orange Jell-O
- 2 c. boiling water
- 1 pt. orange sherbet
- 1 can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 2 bananas, sliced

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in boiling water.
- Add sherbet and allow to melt.
- Add drained fruit and sliced bananas.
- Chill.
- Serves 12.

Peach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 c. plain flour
- 1/4 c. brown sugar (packed)
- 1/2 c. chopped pecans
- 1/2 c. melted margarine

Directions:
- Mix and put in greased 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
- Bake at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.

Vegetable Dip

Ingredients:
- 1 c. Dannon vanilla yogurt
- 1 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 1 tsp. dried dill weed
- 1 tsp. Lawry's seasoned salt
- 1 tsp. dried parsley

Directions:
- Mix well and let stand several hours.
- Use with a variety of fresh vegetables.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch fresh broccoli, chopped
- 1 small onion, chopped
- 1 c. golden raisins
- 3/4 c. sunflower seeds
- 12 slices crisp bacon, crumbled
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/3 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. vinegar

Directions:
- Mix first 5
- ingredients together.
- Mix next 3 ingredients together to make
- dressing.
- Pour dressing over salad and let set for at least 2 to 3 hours before serving.

Caramel Apple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. instant butterscotch pudding
- 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip
- 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple (with juice)
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 3 c. apples (with peelings), chopped
- 1 c. dry roasted peanuts or 3 chopped up Snickers bars

Directions:
- Mix dry pudding, Cool Whip and pineapple and juice until well blended. Stir in apples, marshmallows and peanuts or candy bars until thoroughly combined.
- Refrigerate until served. Best if eaten within 24 hours. Tastes like a caramel apple.

Pea And Peanut Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 slices bacon, fried and crumbled
- 1/2 c. finely chopped onion
- 10 oz. frozen peas, cooked 3 minutes and drained
- 1 c. celery, diced
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/2 to 3/4 c. salted peanuts
- cherry tomatoes, quartered

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients.
- Cool and chill.
- At serving time, add:

Molded Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large pkg. strawberry-banana jello
- 1 pkg. frozen strawberries
- 1 can crushed pineapple (8 oz.)
- 1 c. nuts (more if desired)
- 1 c. sour cream

Directions:
- Mix jello with 1 cup boiling water.
- Add frozen strawberries and stir until separated.
- Add drained crushed pineapple and nuts. Put 1/2 mixture in bowl and set in refrigerator 10 to 15 minutes (until slightly gelled).
- Remove from refrigerator and spread with sour cream.
- Pour remaining jello on top and return to refrigerator.
- (Should remaining jello gel, place bowl in warm water and stir until slightly thin.)

Pasta Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. vermicelli, cooked and drained
- 1 (8 oz.) bottle Wish-Bone Italian dressing
- 3/4 c. chopped fresh parsley
- 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. olive oil
- 2 green onions, chopped
- 1 tsp. oregano
- 1 tsp. basil
- 1 small jar diced pimentos
- garlic salt and lemon pepper to taste
- 1 lb. shrimp meat

Directions:
- Toss first 2 ingredients together and refrigerate overnight. Add remaining ingredients (except shrimp). Refrigerate.
- Just before serving, toss in shrimp meat.

Coca-Cola Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can fruit cocktail
- 1 c. crushed pecans
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 2 small boxes red cherry or strawberry jello
- 1 (12 oz.) can Coke

Directions:
- Drain juice off cocktail and add water to make almost 2 cups. Put jello in and add Coke.
- Place in refrigerator and let almost jel.
- Pour in pecans and fruit cocktail.
- Set in refrigerator until jelled.

Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. strawberry gelatin
- 1 large can crushed pineapple and juice
- 2 c. buttermilk
- 1 (9 oz.) frozen whipped topping
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries, partially thawed
- 1/2 c. nuts (optional)

Directions:
- Mix gelatin and pineapple in saucepan.
- Bring almost to boil; let cool. Add buttermilk, whipped topping, strawberries and nuts. Spread in 9 x 13 pan. Let congeal in refrigerator.

Grandma E'S Molded Shrimp Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. cold water
- 2 c. tomato juice
- 1 small onion, chopped fine
- 1 envelope Knox gelatine
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- dash cayenne pepper
- small bay leaf, if desired
- 1 Tbsp. mild vinegar or lemon juice
- 1/2 lb. small cleaned shrimp, diced
- 1 stalk celery

Directions:
- Mix tomato juice, bay leaf, salt, cayenne pepper, chopped onion and celery (also chopped).
- Put in saucepan and simmer 10 minutes.
- Soften gelatine in cold water and dissolve in hot tomato juice mixture.
- Add vinegar, remove bay leaf and cool.

Orange Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple (small)
- 1/2 c. sugar
- 1 (3 oz.) orange Jell-O
- 1 c. cold water
- 1 large Cool Whip
- lettuce

Directions:
- Bring pineapple and sugar to a boil, then cool.
- Mix Jell-O and water to cool pineapple.
- Chill in refrigerator.
- Fold in large Cool Whip.
- Chill and serve on lettuce or with any vegetable.

Hot Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. diced cooked chicken
- 2 c. diced celery
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise or salad dressing
- 1/2 c. slivered almonds
- 1/2 tsp. Accent
- 2 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 2 Tbsp. grated onion
- 1/2 tsp. salt

Directions:
- Pile lightly in an 8 x 9-inch casserole.
- Sprinkle with 1/2 cup grated cheese and 1 cup crushed potato chips (or any kind of crumbs).
- Bake at 425° for 20 minutes or until hot.

Fresh Vegetable Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches broccoli
- 1 c. raisins
- 1/2 c. toasted sunflower seeds
- chopped onion (optional)
- 1 small head cauliflower
- 1/2 lb. bacon, fried and crumbled
- grated carrots (optional)

Directions:
- Mix all ingredients in large bowl except sunflower seeds. Toss with dressing and store covered in refrigerator.
- Toss in sunflower seeds before serving.

Championship Chicken Breasts

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. Miracle Whip salad dressing
- 2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard
- 1 Tbsp. honey
- 4 boneless chicken breast halves (about 1 1/4 lb.)

Directions:
- Mix salad dressing, mustard and honey.
- Place chicken on grill or rack of broiler pan.
- Brush with half of the salad dressing mixture.
- Grill or broil 8 minutes.
- Turn; brush with remaining salad dressing mixture.
- Continue broiling or grilling 8 to 10 minutes or until tender.
- Makes 4 servings.

Puffy Fried Bread

Ingredients:
- 4 cups Flour
- 1 1\4 tsp. Salt
- 3 tsp. Baking Powder
- 3 tbsp. Sugar
- 2 tbsp. Shortening
- 1 1\4 C. Milk
- Salad Oil for Deep Frying

Directions:
- Sift flour, measure, and sift again with salt, baking powder, and sugar. Cut in shortening, and add milk to make a soft dough just firm enough to roll. Cover bowl and let dough stand for 30 to 60 min. Roll 1\4 inch thick on lightly floured surface. Cut into diamond shaped pieces.
- Heat about 1 inch of oil in frying pan 370° to 380°. Add a few pieces at a time; turn at once, so they will puff evenly. Then turn back to brown on both sides. Drain on paper toweling. Serve with butter or honey. Makes 4 dozen.

Cold Bean Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can green beans, drained (French-style)
- 1 can small garden peas
- 1/2 c. chopped pimento
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 small red onion, sliced in rings
- 1 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. salad oil
- 2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. black pepper
- 1/2 c. sugar

Directions:
- In large mixing bowl, combine first 5 ingredients.
- Combine remaining ingredients and store in refrigerator overnight.

7-Up Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. lime jello
- 1 c. boiling water
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese
- 1 pkg. Dream Whip
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, drained
- 7 oz. 7-Up

Directions:
- Dissolve jello in boiling water.
- Add other ingredients and place in mold.
- Refrigerate.

Tortellini Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (7 oz.) pkg. frozen cheese tortellini
- 1 c. broccoli flowerets
- 1 carrot, shredded
- 1/3 c. sliced olives
- 3/4 c. mayonnaise
- 1/3 c. pesto sauce
- 1/4 c. milk
- 1 Tbsp. oil
- 1 tsp. vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. white pepper
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Cook and drain tortellini as per package directions.
- Set aside in a large bowl.

Crab Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. crabmeat
- 1 lb. elbow macaroni, cooked and drained
- 1 large onion
- 1 large cucumber
- 2 tomatoes
- 1 to 2 c. salad dressing (Miracle Whip)
- Season-All
- bay seasoning

Directions:
- After macaroni has been cooked and drained, add chopped vegetables and salad dressing.
- Mix and season for taste.
- Chill. (When I don't have fresh crabmeat, I use imitation crabmeat.)

Green Wonder Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 medium onions, sliced thinly
- 1 1/2 c. sliced celery
- 3/4 c. cider vinegar
- 2 small jars mushrooms
- 1 c. sugar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. salt
- 1 Tbsp. pepper
- 1 (No. 2) can Chinese vegetables
- 1 (No. 2) can LeSueur English peas
- 1 (No. 2) can French-style green beans
- 1 (8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts

Directions:
- Do not drain liquid from vegetables.
- Mix all and marinate overnight. Lasts weeks. Serves 12 to 16.

Taco Pie

Ingredients:
- 1 pkg. crescent rolls
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 pkg. taco seasoning
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. sour cream
- 1 1/2 lb. ground chuck
- 1 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese
- 2/3 c. water
- 1 bag Doritos, crushed

Directions:
- Use a large glass pie dish or a 9 x 13-inch glass dish. Spread rolls to form crust.
- (Pam the pan first.)
- Brown meat and onion.
- Add taco seasoning and water.
- I bring to boil.
- Spread meat mixture over rolls.
- Spread sour cream over meat.
- Sprinkle cheese over sour cream.
- Top with crushed Doritos.
- Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.
- Serve with a salad.

Cranberry And Orange Salad Mold

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. black cherry jello
- 1 c. hot water
- 1 Tbsp. gelatin
- 1 c. pineapple juice
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. lemon juice
- 1 c. raw cranberries, ground
- 2 c. oranges, peeled and ground
- 1 c. crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 c. chopped pecans

Directions:
- Dissolve cherry gelatin in hot water.
- Add sugar and lemon juice.
- Soak gelatin in pineapple juice and dissolve over hot water.
- Add to cherry gelatin mixture.
- When gelatin begins to thicken, add other ingredients.
- Pour into molds.

Frozen Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 can crushed pineapple, drained
- 1 large carton Cool Whip
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 can Mandarin oranges
- 1 c. nuts
- 1 c. coconut

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients except pineapple and oranges; mix well. Add pineapple and oranges and freeze.

Chicken Liver Stroganoff

Ingredients:
- 1/4 c. butter
- 1/2 lb. halved chicken livers
- 1 tsp. salt
- dash of pepper
- 1 tsp. paprika
- 1 c. sour cream
- 2 c. onions, thinly sliced

Directions:
- Cook onions in butter until tender, not brown.
- Add chicken livers.
- Season with salt and pepper also paprika.
- Brown livers. Cover; cook over low heat for 10 minutes.
- Add sour cream; heat thoroughly.
- Serve over rice.
- Serve with Sue Tossed Salad in 1988 book, page 19.

Watergate Salad

Ingredients:
- 9 oz. whipped topping
- 1 box instant pistachio pudding
- 16 oz. can crushed pineapple with juice
- 1 c. mini marshmallows
- 1/2 c. nuts

Directions:
- Fold dry pudding mix into whipped topping.
- Add pineapple, juice, marshmallows and nuts.
- Refrigerate!

Sugar-Free Orange-Pineapple Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large box sugar-free jello (orange)
- 1 large can crushed pineapple in own juice
- 1 1/2 c. water
- 1 can mandarin oranges (optional)

Directions:
- Boil water and add jello.
- Mix thoroughly.
- Add pineapple and mandarin oranges.
- Refrigerate until congealed.

Seven-Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head iceberg lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
- 1 (12 oz.) can peas, drained
- 3 to 4 stalks celery, sliced or chopped
- 1 Bermuda onion, chopped
- 1 to 2 c. mayonnaise (spread to cover and seal the first four layers)
- 1 c. Parmesan cheese
- 6 to 10 slices bacon, crumbled

Directions:
- In a large bowl, layer the following:
- lettuce, peas, celery, onion and mayonnaise.
- Cover mayonnaise with Parmesan cheese.
- Top with bacon.
- Cover and refrigerate approximately 8 hours prior to serving.
- Serves 8 to 10.

Cool Creamy Cucumber Salad

Ingredients:
- 5 medium cucumbers
- 1 medium red onion, thinly sliced
- 1 (2 oz.) jar sliced pimento, drained
- 1/2 c. prepared Ranch dressing
- 2 Tbsp. chives
- 1 tsp. dill weed

Directions:
- Combine cucumbers, onion, pimento, chives and dill weed in medium size bowl.
- Add the salad dressing and toss.

Dinner Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 bunch cauliflower
- 1 bunch broccoli
- 8 carrots
- 3 tomatoes (large)
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 c. Cheddar cheese, grated
- 2 c. cooked and cubed ham, turkey or chicken
- 3 hard-boiled eggs (optional)
- 1 c. Miracle Whip or your favorite dressing

Directions:
- Chop broccoli, cauliflower, lettuce and tomatoes. Place the vegetables in a large mixing bowl.
- Grate carrots and add to vegetable mixture.
- Stir in cheese and meat.
- If adding the hard-boiled eggs, slice them and mix into vegetables. Mix with Miracle Whip and refrigerate 1 hour.
- Serve with crackers or toast.

Baked Seafood Rice Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/3 c. rice, cooked
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1/2 c. green pepper, finely chopped
- 3 green onions, finely sliced
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can water chestnuts
- 1 (4 1/2 oz.) can medium shrimp, drained
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can crabmeat or chicken
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 3/4 c. tomato juice
- grated Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- Combine first 9 ingredients.
- Put in shallow 2 quart casserole and sprinkle with cheese.
- Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
- Makes 6 servings.

German Potato Salad(Kartoffelsalat)  

Ingredients:
- 12 slices bacon, diced and fried until crisp (reserve 6 Tbsp. drippings)
- 3 medium-size onions, chopped (about 2 c.)
- 1 c. less 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 3/4 tsp. pepper
- 2 to 3 lb. potatoes, cooked, peeled and cut in 1/4-inch slices*

Directions:
- *The amount of potatoes used for this tangy hot potato salad will determine the number of servings.

Macaroni Salad(For Large Gathering)  

Ingredients:
- 2 lb. box macaroni
- 2 lb. Colby cheese
- 4 large tomatoes
- 3 or 4 medium cucumbers
- 2 or 3 medium bell peppers
- 1 medium jar sweet pickle relish
- 1 to 1 1/2 qt. Miracle Whip

Directions:
- Cook macaroni.
- Drain and let cool. Cut cheese, tomatoes, cucumbers and bell peppers in little cubes.
- Mix this with cooled macaroni, relish and Miracle Whip to taste.
- (Original recipe did not list quantities or ingredients.)

Alessa'S Cornbread Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (1 oz.) pkg. Ranch dressing mix
- 1 c. sour cream
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1 (9-inch) pan cornbread, crumbled
- 2 (16 oz.) cans pinto beans, drained
- 3 large tomatoes, chopped
- 1/2 c. chopped green pepper
- 1/2 c. chopped green onions
- 2 c. (8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese
- 10 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled
- 1 (17 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained

Directions:
- Combine salad dressing mix, sour cream and mayonnaise.
- Set aside.
- Place half of crumbled cornbread in a large bowl.
- Top with half of beans.
- In a medium bowl, combine tomatoes, pepper and onions; layer half of this mixture over beans.
- Layer half of cheese, bacon, corn and reserved salad dressing.
- Repeat layers, using remaining ingredients.
- Garnish as desired.

Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lime jello (3 oz. size)
- 1 cream cheese (8 oz.)
- 1 c. crushed pineapple
- marshmallow topping

Directions:
- Mix jello according to directions.
- Beat in cream cheese.
- Add pineapple after draining.
- Add nuts, if you want.
- Sprinkle marshmallow topping on top.
- Chill until firm.
- Any flavor of jello and fruit combination could be substituted.

Green Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) lemon Jell-O
- 2 (3 oz.) lime Jell-O
- 1 c. grated cheese
- 1 small can pineapple
- 1 c. whipped topping
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Mix Jell-O as directed on package. When it begins to set, add rest of the ingredients. Mix well. Let set. Serve on lettuce with mayonnaise and crackers.

Dilled Macaroni And Cheese Salad(Cold)  

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. uncooked macaroni
- 1 c. cubed low-fat Cheddar cheese
- 1/3 c. celery, thinly sliced
- 1/3 c. green pepper, chopped
- 1 (2 oz.) jar pimento, diced

Directions:
- Cook macaroni, omitting salt.
- Drain well; rinse in cold water.
- Combine the next 4 ingredients and the cooked macaroni.

Pea Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 medium can peas
- 1 medium can corn
- 1 c. chopped celery
- 1 c. chopped onion
- 1 c. chopped green pepper
- 1 jar diced pimiento
- 1 c. sugar
- 3/4 c. white vinegar
- 1/4 c. oil
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1 tsp. pepper

Directions:
- Mix sugar, vinegar, oil, salt and pepper; heat until sugar dissolves.
- Let cool.
- Add peas, corn, celery, onion, green pepper and pimiento.
- Let chill overnight.

Rich And Charlie'S Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large jar pimentos
- 2 jars marinated artichoke hearts
- 1 red onion, cut in rings
- 1/4 c. Parmesan cheese
- 3/4 c. salad oil
- 1/4 c. red wine vinegar
- 1 clove garlic, chopped
- 1/2 tsp. salt
- 1/2 tsp. Accent
- generous dash of pepper
- 1 large head lettuce
- spinach (if desired)

Directions:
- Marinate 3 hours.
- Add one large head of lettuce.
- Sprinkle on more Parmesan cheese.

Turkey Chili

Ingredients:
- 1 Tbsp. salad oil
- 16 oz. ground turkey
- 1 large onion, diced
- 1 small garlic clove, minced
- 4 tsp. chili powder
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes
- 1 c. water
- 1 1/2 tsp. salt
- 3/4 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper
- 15 1/4 oz. can red kidney beans

Directions:
- In a large skillet over medium-high heat, in hot salad oil, cook turkey, onion and garlic until all pan juices evaporate and turkey is well browned, stirring frequently.
- Stir in chili powder and cook 1 minute.
- Stir in tomatoes with their liquid, water, salt, sugar and crushed red pepper.
- Over high heat, heat to boiling.
- Reduce heat to low.
- Simmer uncovered 10 minutes to blend flavors.
- Gently stir in kidney beans and heat through.

Mushrooms And Steak

Ingredients:
- 1 1/2 lb. top sirloin
- 3 Tbsp. butter or margarine
- 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce
- 1 tsp. dried basil
- 1/2 tsp. dried tarragon
- 3 c. mushrooms, sliced
- 1/2 c. dry vermouth (wine)
- 1/4 c. Jack cheese, shredded
- 1 Tbsp. flour

Directions:
- Cut steak into 4 servings. Melt butter in skillet; add Worcestershire sauce, basil and tarragon.
- Place steaks in skillet. Cook 5 minutes on both sides.
- Remove to warmed platter.
- Cover with foil.
- Place mushrooms in skillet.
- Add wine, salt and pepper.
- Saute until mushrooms are cooked.
- In a small bowl, toss cheese with flour and stir in with mushrooms.
- Cook until cheese is melted.
- Pour over steaks.
- Great with potatoes (baked) and salad.
- This is so easy and great.

Cranberry Congealed Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (3 oz.) pkg. cherry Jell-O
- 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (reserve juice)
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained
- 1 can whole berry cranberry sauce

Directions:
- Heat pineapple juice and dissolve Jell-O.
- Stir well.
- Add cranberry sauce and mix well.
- Add pineapple and oranges.
- Mix well and pour into Jell-O mold.
- Chill.

Strawberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 oz. pkg. jello, dissolved
- 1 pkg. sliced drained strawberries
- 1 carton Cool Whip (8 oz.)
- 1 small carton sour cream
- 1 small can crushed drained pineapple

Directions:
- Place sliced strawberries in jello; congeal overnight.
- Mix Cool Whip, sour cream and pineapple.
- Spread over jello.
- Top with chopped pecans.
- Chill again until firm.

Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 7 lb. potatoes
- salt and pepper
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 1/2 c. oil
- 4 hard-boiled eggs, diced
- 3 c. celery
- 1/2 c. pimento
- 2 c. mayonnaise

Directions:
- Cut up potatoes and boil.
- Add salt, pepper, vinegar and oil to warm potatoes.
- Let cool and add remaining ingredients.

Kraut Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (2 lb.) can kraut
- 2/3 c. vinegar
- 2 c. sugar
- 2 c. celery, chopped
- 1/2 c. onion, chopped
- 1/2 c. green pepper

Directions:
- Bring sugar and vinegar to a boil.
- Set aside to cool.
- Mix vegetables with kraut.
- Pour liquid over mixture.
- Let set in refrigerator for 24 hours.
- Keeps a long time.

Marinated Mushrooms And Veggies

Ingredients:
- 2/3 c. vinegar
- 2/3 c. olive or salad oil
- 1/4 c. chopped onion
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 1 tsp. sugar
- 1 tsp. basil, crushed
- 1 tsp. oregano, crushed
- 8 oz. fresh mushrooms, halved or quartered
- 1 (16 oz.) can whole carrots (may be sliced)
- 1 (14 oz.) can artichoke hearts, drained and halved
- 1 c. pitted ripe olives, halved
- 1 c. sliced celery
- 1 (2 oz.) jar sliced pimientos, drained (1/4 c. chopped)

Directions:
- In saucepan, combine vinegar, oil, onion, garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, sugar, basil, oregano and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.
- Bring to a boil; simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes.
- Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl.
- Pour hot marinade over veggies.
- Stir; chill several hours, stirring occasionally.
- Drain before serving.
- Serve in lettuce lined bowl.
- Makes 7 cups.
- Great Thanksgiving dish.

7 Cup Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 large can pineapple chunks, drained
- 1 (11 oz.) can mandarin orange segments, drained
- 1 1/2 c. seedless grapes
- 1 c. coconut
- 1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows
- 1 c. nuts
- 3/4 c. sour cream
- 1 tsp. sugar

Directions:
- Mix all together, except sour cream and sugar.
- Now add sour cream and sugar.
- Mix well and chill.

Wilted Spinach Salad

Ingredients:
- 3 strips bacon
- 1/4 c. vinegar
- 2 tsp. sugar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 1/8 tsp. dried tarragon
- 1/2 c. sliced celery
- 1 small red onion, thinly sliced
- 1 pkg. fresh spinach leaves, torn (about 8 c. total)
- 2 medium oranges, peeled and sliced*
- 1/3 c. cashews, coarsely broken

Directions:
- In 3-quart casserole snip bacon into 1 inch pieces.
- Cover with paper towel.
- Microwave at High (10) 2 to 3 minutes, until crisp.
- With slotted spoon, place bacon on paper towels to drain. To bacon drippings add vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and tarragon. Microwave at High (10) 2 to 3 minutes, until mixture boils.
- Stir in celery and onion.
- Gradually add spinach to hot dressing, tossing to coat each piece.
- Add crumbled bacon, orange segments and cashews.
- Toss again lightly.
- Serve immediately.
- Total Microwave Cooking Time:
- 4 to 6 minutes.
- Makes 8 to 10 servings.

Cranberry Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh cranberries, ground
- 1 c. sugar
- 2 c. green grapes, halved (seedless if possible)
- 1 c. pecans, finely cut

Directions:
- Mix cranberries and sugar; this mixture should drain overnight in a colander in the refrigerator.
- Dispose of juice.
- Mix cranberry mixture with grapes and pecans.
- Beat 1/2 pint of whipping cream; add sugar to taste.
- Mix with cranberries.
- Makes a festive salad.
- Delicious when served with turkey.

Old Fashioned Potato Salad

Ingredients:
- 6 or 7 red potatoes
- 4 diced dill pickles
- 1 medium onion
- 3 boiled eggs (hard)
- 1 1/2 Tbsp. mustard
- 1/4 stick butter
- 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise
- 1 Tbsp. salt

Directions:
- Cook potatoes until done and add salt while cooking. When tender, drain all water off of potatoes; add butter, mustard and mayonnaise. Mix with mixer on low speed. Add remaining chopped boiled eggs, diced onion and diced dill pickles. Stir together and really enjoy.

Broccoli Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 bunches broccoli
- 10 slices bacon
- 1 large red onion
- 1/3 c. raisins
- 1 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 c. sugar
- 2 Tbsp. cider vinegar
- 1/2 tsp. black pepper
- 1/2 c. toasted sunflower seeds

Directions:
- Cut broccoli flowerets into smaller than bite-size pieces. Cut off tough outer layer of stalks and chop the tender part into small pieces.
- You need 8 cups of broccoli.
- (Do this the day before and store in plastic bag.)
- Saute bacon until crisp.
- Slice onion lengthwise.
- In large bowl, combine the broccoli, onion and raisins and bacon.
- In small bowl, mix together mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar and pepper.
- Combine dressing with the vegetables; refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.
- Top with sunflower seeds.

Quick Taco Salad

Ingredients:
- 3/4 lb. lean ground beef
- 1/2 c. chopped onion
- 1 pkg. Rice-A-Roni beef flavor
- 1/2 c. salsa
- 1 tsp. chili powder
- 4 c. shredded lettuce
- 1 medium tomato chopped
- 1/2 c. shredded Monterey Jack or Cheddar cheese
- 1/2 c. crushed tortilla chips

Directions:
- Step 1:
- In a large skillet, brown ground beef and onion. Drain.
- Remove from skillet.
- Set aside.

24-Hour Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 small head or 1/2 large head lettuce
- 1 pkg. frozen green peas
- 1 chopped green pepper
- 8 celery stalks, chopped
- 1 red onion, chopped
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese
- 6 slices crumbled fried bacon

Directions:
- Make 24 hours before serving.
- Use large casserole or large glass pan.
- Shred or tear lettuce into dish, approximately 1/3 full.
- Layer on top of the following (do not stir): green peas, green pepper, celery, red onion.
- Frost entire top with the following mixture:
- mayonnaise, sour cream and sugar.
- Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.
- Right before serving, sprinkle with bacon.

Cioppino

Ingredients:
- 1 lb. fresh or frozen fish fillets
- 3/4 c. chopped green onion
- 1/2 c. chopped onions
- 1 clove garlic, minced
- 1 Tbsp. cooking oil
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, cut up
- 1 (16 oz.) can tomato sauce
- 1/2 c. red wine
- 3 Tbsp. snipped parsley
- 1/4 tsp. oregano
- 1/4 tsp. basil
- 1/8 tsp. salt
- 1 (6 1/2 oz.) can minced clams
- 1 (4 1/2 oz.) can shrimp, rinsed and drained
- dash of black pepper

Directions:
- Thaw fish if frozen.
- Cut fish into 1-inch pieces.
- In a large saucepan, cook green onion, onion and garlic in hot oil until tender.
- Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, wine, parsley, oregano, basil, salt and pepper.
- Bring to boiling, then reduce heat. Cover and simmer 20 minutes.
- Add fish, shrimp and undrained clams.
- Bring just to boiling, then reduce heat.
- Cover and simmer 5 to 7 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork.
- This stew is delicious on its own or over rice.
- Serve with salad and warm bread.

Mexican Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 head lettuce
- 1 or 2 tomatoes, diced
- 1 can Ranch Style beans, drained
- 1 small pkg. Fritos, crushed
- Cheddar cheese
- 1 small bottle Italian dressing

Directions:
- Pinch lettuce in small pieces.
- Combine all other ingredients except Fritos.
- Add them just before serving.

Jello Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O
- 1 (16 oz.) carton sour cream
- 1 (15 1/2 oz.) can crushed pineapple

Directions:
- Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.
- Fold in sour cream and pineapple.
- Pour into oiled mold.
- (Halved works well.)

Champagne Salad(Frozen)  

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. sugar
- 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened
- 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip
- 1 small can crushed pineapple, with juice
- 2 to 3 bananas, sliced thin
- 1 (10 oz.) pkg. thawed frozen strawberries
- 1/4 c. chopped nuts

Directions:
- Fold in fruit and nuts with mixture.
- Freeze in Pyrex dish. Cut into squares.
- Fills a 7 x 11-inch dish.

7 Layer Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 head lettuce, chopped
- onion, sliced in rings
- green pepper, sliced in rings
- 1 pkg. frozen peas, blanched
- 1 c. Miracle Whip
- 1 small jar bacon bits
- 2 c. grated cheese
- grated carrot (optional)
- chopped radishes (optional)

Directions:
- Layer in bowl as listed.
- Let sit 8 hours overnight in refrigerator.

Israeli Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 green pepper
- 1 red pepper
- 1 yellow pepper
- 1 bunch radishes
- 2 cucumbers
- 1 to 2 tomatoes
- 1/8 c. oil
- salt and taste
- 1 to 2 fresh lemons

Directions:
- Dice each vegetable into extremely small pieces.
- Add oil, then squeeze in the juice of 1 to 2 lemons depending on your taste.
- Add the salt, then add lemon, oil and salt based on how much salad you need.
- The salad should be tart and refreshing.

Tomato Parmesan Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 1/3 c. vegetable oil or olive oil
- 1 c. red wine vinegar
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- salt and pepper to taste
- 2 bunches romaine lettuce, torn
- 1 head iceberg lettuce, torn
- 2 small red onions, thinly sliced
- 2 large tomatoes, diced
- 1 (4 oz.) jar diced pimientos, drained
- 2/3 c. shredded Parmesan cheese

Directions:
- In a small bowl or jar with a tight-fitting lid, combine oil, vinegar, garlic, salt and pepper; set aside.
- In a large salad bowl, combine all remaining ingredients.
- Chill until ready to serve.

Garden Green Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. torn romaine lettuce
- 1/2 c. sliced green onions (scallions)
- 1/2 c. thinly sliced celery
- 3 Tbsp. vegetable oil
- 1/2 tsp. dehydrated cane juice
- 1/8 tsp. pepper
- 2 c. torn fresh spinach
- 1 medium cucumber
- 8 cherry tomatoes, halved
- 1 tsp. dried parsley flakes
- 1/4 tsp. dried whole oregano

Directions:
- Combine first 6 ingredients in a large bowl.
- Toss well. Combine lemon juice and remaining ingredients in a jar.
- Cover tightly and shake vigorously.
- Pour over lettuce mixture.
- Toss gently.
- Yields
- 4 servings.

Fresh Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 banana
- 1 apple
- 1 tangerine

Directions:
- Cut up fruit.
- Mix it in a bowl.
- Mix 3 teaspoons of plain yogurt and 1 teaspoon of vanilla with fruit.

Blt Macaroni Salad

Ingredients:
- 2 c. elbow macaroni (uncooked)
- 5 green onions, finely chopped
- 1 large tomato, diced
- 1 1/4 c. celery, diced
- 1 1/4 c. mayonnaise
- 5 tsp. white vinegar
- 1/4 tsp. salt
- 1/8 to 1/4 tsp. pepper
- 1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled

Directions:
- Cook macaroni; drain and rinse in cold water. In a large bowl, combine the macaroni, green onions, tomato and celery. In a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, vinegar, salt and pepper. Pour over macaroni mixture and toss to coat. Cover and chill for at least 2 hours. Just before serving, add bacon. Yield: 12 servings.

Valley Fresh Chicken Salad

Ingredients:
- 1/2 c. mayonnaise
- 1/4 tsp. garlic powder
- 1/4 tsp. onion powder
- 1/8 tsp. dry mustard
- 1/2 c. diced celery
- 2 Tbsp. chopped green onion
- 1 can Valley French chunky chicken, drained and cut into pieces

Directions:
- Combine all ingredients.
- Cover and chill before serving.

Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip
- 1 can cherry pie filling
- 1 (No. 2) can peaches, drained
- 1 (16 oz.) can pineapple, drained
- 1 can Eagle Brand milk
- 1 jar maraschino cherries
- pecans or favorite nuts

Directions:
- Drain peaches and pineapple. Mix all together. Garnish with cherries and pecans. Chill.

Fabulous Fruit Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 pt. strawberries
- 2 to 3 peaches
- 1 pineapple
- 1 pt. blueberries
- 1 pt. raspberries
- 2 to 3 kiwi fruits
- 1 large box instant vanilla pudding mix

Directions:
- All fruits must be fresh, not canned or frozen.
- Prepare and slice all fruit into bite size pieces.
- Mix instant pudding mix powder (not prepared) with fruit and refrigerate overnight in sealed bowl.
- Before serving the next day, toss lightly, mixing thoroughly.
- The juice and pudding mix make a nice fruit pudding.

Country Fair Corn Sticks

Ingredients:
- 3/4 c. yellow corn meal
- 3/4 c. flour
- 2 Tbsp. sugar
- 1 Tbsp. baking powder
- 1 tsp. salt
- 1/4 c. salad oil
- 1/2 medium red bell pepper, diced
- 2 green onions, thinly sliced
- 1 (8 1/2 to 8 3/4 oz.) can cream-style corn
- 1/2 c. milk
- 1 egg

Directions:
- Preheat oven to 400°.
- Grease well 14 corn stick molds.
- Place in oven while preparing batter.
- In large bowl, mix corn meal, flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.
- In small skillet, add oil and cook pepper and onions until tender.
- Remove skillet from heat.
- Stir in corn and milk, then egg until mixed; stir into dry ingredients until batter is just blended.
- Spoon batter into preheated molds.
- Bake 15 minutes or until done.
- Cool in molds on wire rack 5 minutes.
- Remove from molds.

Peach Salad

Ingredients:
- 1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple
- 1 c. water
- 1 c. sugar
- 8 oz. cream cheese
- 5 Tbsp. milk
- 9 oz. Cool Whip
